  49def trace(env, callback):
  50	"""Replace the ``step()`` method of *env* with a tracing function
  51	that calls *callbacks* with an events time, priority, ID and its
  52	instance just before it is processed.
  53
  54	"""
  55	def get_wrapper(env_step, callback):
  56		"""Generate the wrapper for env.step()."""
  57		@wraps(env_step)
  58		def tracing_step():
  59			"""Call *callback* for the next event if one exist before
  60			calling ``env.step()``."""
  61			if len(env._queue):
  62				t, prio, eid, event = env._queue[0]
  63				callback(t, prio, eid, event)
  64			return env_step()
  65
  66		return tracing_step
  67
  68	env.step = get_wrapper(env.step, callback)

 120	def __init__(self, paras, log_file=None):
 121		self.paras = paras
 122
 123		self.is_reset = True
 124		self.agents_built = False
 125
 126		# to monitor process memory
 127		self.process = psutil.Process(os.getpid())
 128
 129		self.event_recordings = []
 130		# Bind *data* as first argument to monitor()
 131		# see https://docs.python.org/3/library/functools.html#functools.partial
 132		def monitor(data, t, prio, eid, event):
 133			data.append((t, eid, type(event)))
 134
 135		self.monitor_f = partial(monitor, self.event_recordings)
 136
 137		self.start_env()
 138
 139		self.uid = 0
 140
 141		global aprint
 142		aprint = build_col_print_func(self.paras['print_colors__alert'], file=log_file)
 143
 144		global mprint
 145		mprint = build_col_print_func(self.paras['print_colors__info'], file=log_file)
 146
 147		self.rs = RandomState()
 148		if my_seed is not None:
 149			aprint("###############################################")
 150			aprint("###############################################")
 151			aprint("###############################################")
 152			aprint()
 153			aprint('WARNING! THERE IS A SEED:', str(my_seed))
 154			aprint()
 155			aprint("###############################################")
 156			aprint("###############################################")
 157			aprint("###############################################")
 158			aprint()
 159
 160			if hasattr(self, 'engine'):
 161				self.engine = self.engine
 162			else:
 163				self.engine = None
 164
 165			try:
 166				self.rs.seed(my_seed)
 167			except:
 168				seed = read_seed(engine=self.engine,
 169								table=self.paras['seed_table'],
 170								scenario_id=my_seed['scenario_id'],
 171								n_iter=my_seed['n_iter'],
 172								model_version=my_seed['model_version'])
 173
 174				self.rs.set_state(seed)
 175
 176		else:
 177			seed = RandomState().get_state()
 178			self.rs.set_state(seed)

 187	def load_scenario(self, info_scenario=None, case_study_conf=None, data_scenario=None, paras_scenario=None,
 188					  connection=None, log_file=None):
 189		"""
 190		This method does not need to be called at every iteration.
 191		"""
 192		sl = ScenarioLoaderSelector().select(self.paras['read_profile']['scenario_loader'])
 193		
 194		self.sc = sl(info_scenario=info_scenario,
 195					 case_study_conf=case_study_conf,
 196					 data_scenario=data_scenario,
 197					paras_scenario=paras_scenario,
 198					log_file=log_file,
 199					print_color_info=self.paras['print_colors__info'])
 200
 201		self.sc.load_all_data(data_to_load=self.data_to_load,
 202								process=self.process,
 203								connection=connection,
 204								rs=self.rs,
 205								profile_paras=self.paras['read_profile'],
 206								verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'])
 207
 208		# TODO: check incompatibilities between modules.
 209		# Load modules
 210		self.modules = OrderedDict()  # to keep loading order, in case important.
 211
 212		self.path_module = Path(self.sc.paras['modules__path'])
 213		if not self.path_module.is_absolute():
 214			root_path = Path(__file__).resolve().parent.parent
 215			self.path_module = root_path / self.path_module
 216
 217		# Modifications to ALL agents
 218		self.module_agent_modif = OrderedDict({})
 219
 220		# Modifications to some agents only; to be loaded in each agent creation method
 221		self.module_agent_modif_post = OrderedDict({})
 222		
 223		# Module parameters to add to the agent builder
 224		self.module_agent_paras = OrderedDict({})
 225
 226		# Note: parameters are passed from outside, in the self.sc.paras dictionary, with mthe module__parametername
 227		# format
 228		self.get_modules_results_functions = []
 229		print('Modules to be loaded:', self.sc.paras['modules__modules_to_load'])
 230		for module in self.sc.paras['modules__modules_to_load']:
 231			# self.module_agent_paras[module] = copy(self.sc.paras[module])
 232
 233			# Load module
 234			cred = load_mercury_module(path_module=self.path_module,
 235									   module_name=module)
 236
 237			# This allows modules to compute their proper metrics. For this they need to define a function called
 238			# "get_metric" that has a single argument, the world builder.
 239			mspecs = cred.__getattribute__('module_specs')
 240			if not mspecs.get('get_metric', None) is None:
 241				self.get_modules_results_functions.append(mspecs.get('get_metric'))
 242
 243			# Here if we go though all the modifications specified in all the module files
 244			for agent, role_modif in mspecs.get('agent_modif', {}).items():
 245				self.module_agent_paras[agent] = {'{}__{}'.format(module, para_name): self.sc.paras['{}__{}'.format(module, para_name)] for para_name in role_modif.get('new_parameters', [])}
 246
 247				if agent not in mspecs.get('apply_to', {}).keys():
 248					if agent not in self.module_agent_modif.keys():
 249						self.module_agent_modif[agent] = {}
 250
 251					for role, modif in role_modif.items():
 252						if role != 'on_init':
 253							if type(modif) == dict:
 254								if role not in self.module_agent_modif[agent].keys():
 255									self.module_agent_modif[agent][role] = {}
 256
 257								for met1, met2 in modif.items():
 258									if met1 != 'on_init':
 259										self.module_agent_modif[agent][role][met1] = met2
 260									else:
 261										# Case where one needs to apply some stuff at the initialisation of the
 262										# ROLE.
 263										self.module_agent_modif[agent][role][met1] = self.module_agent_modif[agent][role].get(met1, []) + [met2]
 264							else:
 265								# role is not a Role but a method of the agent itself
 266								self.module_agent_modif[agent][role] = modif
 267						else:
 268							# Case where one needs to apply some stuff at the initialisation of the
 269							# AGENT.
 270							self.module_agent_modif[agent]['on_init'] = self.module_agent_modif[agent].get('on_init', []) + [modif]
 271				else:
 272					# The apply_to is then applied in the construction method
 273					# TODO: currently only working with AOCs.
 274					# for agent, role_modif in mspecs.get('agent_modif', {}).items():
 275					if agent not in self.module_agent_modif_post.keys():
 276						self.module_agent_modif_post[agent] = []
 277					self.module_agent_modif_post[agent].append(mspecs)
 278
 279		# print('Module agent modifications:')
 280		# for agent, modif in self.module_agent_modif.items():
 281		# 	print(agent, modif)
 282
 283		# print('\nModule agent modifications post:', self.module_agent_modif_post)
 284
 285		# self.sc.give_data(self)

 287	def build_agents(self, log_file=None):
 288		self.build_print(log_file)
 289
 290		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
 291		with clock_time(message_before='Freezing random state (RGN)...',
 292						oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
 293			self.freeze_RNG()
 294
 295		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
 296
 297		with clock_time(message_before='Creating unique agents...',
 298						oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
 299			self.create_unique_agents()
 300		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
 301
 302		with clock_time(message_before='Creating airports...',
 303				oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
 304			self.create_airports()  # needs to be after the creation of unique agents
 305		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
 306
 307		if (self.sc.manual_airport_regulations is not None) or (self.sc.stochastic_airport_regulations != 'N'):
 308			with clock_time(message_before='Creating explicit regulations at airports...',
 309						oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
 310				self.create_atfm_at_airports()  # needs to be after airport creation
 311		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
 312
 313		with clock_time(message_before='Preparing flight plans...',
 314				oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
 315			self.prepare_flight_plans()
 316		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
 317
 318		with clock_time(message_before='Creating EAMANs...',
 319						oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
 320			self.create_AMANs()  # needs to be after the creation of airports
 321		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes 
 322
 323		with clock_time(message_before='Creating DMANs...',
 324						oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
 325			self.create_DMANs()
 326		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
 327
 328		with clock_time(message_before='Registering airports in Radar...',
 329						oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
 330			self.register_airports_in_radar()
 331		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
 332
 333		with clock_time(message_before='Creating AOCs and alliances...',
 334						oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
 335			self.create_AOCs_and_alliances()
 336		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
 337
 338		with clock_time(message_before='Creating Flights...',
 339						oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
 340			self.create_flights()
 341		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
 342
 343		with clock_time(message_before='Creating Pax...',
 344						oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
 345			self.create_pax()
 346		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
 347
 348		# self.check_consistency()
 349
 350		# Put all agents in a list for easy access
 351
 352		self.agents = list(self.airports.values())
 353		self.agents += list(self.eamans.values())
 354		self.agents += list(self.dmans.values())
 355		self.agents += self.aocs.values()
 356		self.agents += self.flights.values()
 357		self.agents.append(self.nm)
 358		self.agents.append(self.radar)
 359
 360		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
 361
 362		mmprint('World is ready!')
 363		mmprint('Number of agents:')
 364		mmprint('- Ground airports:', len(self.airports))
 365		mmprint('- E-AMAN:', len(self.eamans))
 366		mmprint('- DMAN:', len(self.airports))
 367		mmprint('- AOCs:', len(self.aocs))
 368		mmprint('- Flights:', len(self.flights))
 369		mmprint('- NM:', 1)
 370		mmprint('- Radar:', 1)
 371		mmprint('- Flight swapper:', 1)
 372		mmprint()
 373		mmprint('Other resources:')
 374		mmprint('- Aircraft:', len(self.aircraft))
 375		mmprint('- Alliances:', len(self.alliances))
 376		mmprint('- Pax groups:', len(self.paxs))
 377		mmprint('- Total number of pax:', sum([pax.n_pax for pax in self.paxs]))
 378		mmprint('- Flight plans:', len(self.sc.dict_fp))
 379		mmprint()
 380
 381		self.print_information()
 382
 383		self.agents_built = True

 494	def prepare_flight_plans(self):
 495		self.fp_pool = {}
 496		for (origin_icao, destination_icao, bada, _, _), fp in self.sc.dict_fp.items():
 497			O, D = self.airports_per_icao[origin_icao].uid, self.airports_per_icao[destination_icao].uid
 498
 499			fp.origin_airport_uid = O
 500			fp.destination_airport_uid = D
 501			fp.origin_icao = origin_icao
 502			fp.destination_icao = destination_icao
 503
 504			self.fp_pool[(O, D, bada)] = self.fp_pool.get((O, D, bada), []) + [fp]
 505
 506	def check_consistency(self):
 507		# Check that consecutive flights sharing the same aircraft land
 508		# and depart at the same airport.
 509
 510		for aircraft in self.aircraft.values():
 511			for i in range(0, len(aircraft.queue)-1):
 512				f1 = self.flights_uid[aircraft.queue[i].flight_uid]
 513				f2 = self.flights_uid[aircraft.queue[i+1].flight_uid]
 514				try:
 515					assert f1.destination_airport_uid == f2.origin_airport_uid
 516				except:
 517					print('The', aircraft, 'have the following queue:', aircraft.queue)
 518					print('Flights at positions', i, 'and', i+1, '(uids', f1, 'and',
 519							f2, '), (ids', f1.id, 'and', f2.id,
 520							') do not have the same landing/departure airport')
 521					print('The destination airport of', f1, 'is:', f1.destination_airport_uid)
 522					print('The origin airport of', f2, 'is:', f2.origin_airport_uid)
 523					raise
 524
 525	def create_unique_agents(self):
 526		self.nm = NetworkManager(self.postman,
 527								env=self.env,
 528								uid=self.uid,
 529								mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__nm'],
 530								acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
 531								verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
 532								log_file=self.log_file_it,
 533								rs = self.rs,
 534								hotspot_solver=self.sc.paras.get('hotspot_solver', None),
 535								hotspot_time_before_resolution=self.sc.paras['network_manager__hotspot_time_before_resolution'],
 536								hotpost_archetype_function=self.sc.paras.get('network_manager__hotpost_archetype_function', None),
 537								hostpot_minimum_resolution_size=self.sc.paras['network_manager__hostpot_minimum_resolution_size'],
 538								hotspot_save_folder=self.paras['outputs_handling__hotspot_save_folder'],
 539								module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('NetworkManager', {}))
 540
 541		self.nm.register_atfm_probabilities(p_non_weather=self.sc.non_weather_prob_atfm,
 542											p_weather=self.sc.weather_prob_atfm,
 543											iedf_atfm_non_weather=self.sc.non_weather_atfm_delay_dist,
 544											iedf_atfm_weather=self.sc.weather_atfm_delay_dist)
 545
 546		self.uid += 1
 547
 548		self.radar = Radar(self.postman,
 549							env=self.env,
 550							uid=self.uid,
 551							mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__radar'],
 552							acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
 553							verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
 554							log_file=self.log_file_it,
 555							rs=self.rs,
 556							module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('Radar', {}))
 557		self.uid += 1
 558
 559		self.nm.register_radar(radar=self.radar)
 560
 561		# This is not an agent
 562		self.cr = CentralRegistry()
 563
 564		# ONLY FOR TESTING
 565		self.cr.register_network_manager(self.nm)
 566
 567	def define_regulations_airport(self, dregs_airports, regulations_day):
 568		self.regulations_day_dt = (dt.datetime.strptime(regulations_day[1:-1], '%Y-%m-%d'))  # [1:-1] to remove the ' '
 569
 570		day_reg = self.regulations_day_dt.date()
 571		prev_day_reg = (self.regulations_day_dt+dt.timedelta(days=-1)).date()
 572		next_day_reg = (self.regulations_day_dt+dt.timedelta(days=1)).date()
 573
 574		ref_day_flight = self.sc.df_schedules['sobt'].apply(lambda x: x.date()).value_counts().idxmax()
 575		prev_ref_day_flight = (ref_day_flight+dt.timedelta(days=-1))
 576		next_ref_day_flight = (ref_day_flight+dt.timedelta(days=1))
 577
 578		mmprint('Modifying DataFrame')
 579		dregs_airports = dregs_airports.copy()
 580		dregs_airports['reg_period_start'] = dregs_airports['reg_period_start'].apply(lambda x: x.replace(year=ref_day_flight.year, month=ref_day_flight.month, day=ref_day_flight.day)
 581																										if x.date() == day_reg else
 582																								(x.replace(year=prev_ref_day_flight.year, month=prev_ref_day_flight.month, day=prev_ref_day_flight.day)
 583																										if x.date() == prev_day_reg else
 584																								(x.replace(year=next_ref_day_flight.year, month=next_ref_day_flight.month, day=next_ref_day_flight.day)
 585																										if x.date() == next_day_reg else None)))
 586
 587		dregs_airports['reg_period_end'] = dregs_airports['reg_period_end'].apply(lambda x: x.replace(year=ref_day_flight.year, month=ref_day_flight.month, day=ref_day_flight.day)
 588																										if x.date() == day_reg else
 589																								(x.replace(year=prev_ref_day_flight.year, month=prev_ref_day_flight.month, day=prev_ref_day_flight.day)
 590																										if x.date() == prev_day_reg else
 591																								(x.replace(year=next_ref_day_flight.year, month=next_ref_day_flight.month, day=next_ref_day_flight.day)
 592																										if x.date() == next_day_reg else None)))
 593
 594		mmprint('Creating capacity periods and atfm regulation')
 595		dict_regulations = {}
 596		for i, row in dregs_airports.iterrows():
 597			cp = CapacityPeriod(capacity=row['capacity'],
 598								start_time=(row['reg_period_start']-self.sc.reference_dt).total_seconds()/60.,
 599								end_time=(row['reg_period_end']-self.sc.reference_dt).total_seconds()/60.)
 600
 601			if cp.start_time > cp.end_time:
 602				mmprint("******* Regulation period ending before starting, manually adjusting",
 603						row['reg_sid'], row['capacity'], row['reg_period_start'], row['reg_period_end'])
 604				cp.end_time = cp.start_time+1
 605
 606			regulation = dict_regulations.get(row['reg_sid'], None)
 607			if regulation is None:
 608				if row['icao_id'] in self.airports_per_icao.keys():
 609					regulation = ATFMRegulation(location=self.airports_per_icao[row['icao_id']].uid,
 610												capacity_periods=[cp],
 611												env=self.env)
 612					dict_regulations[row['reg_sid']] = regulation
 613			else:
 614				dict_regulations[row['reg_sid']].add_capacity_period(cp)
 615
 616		for reg in dict_regulations.values():
 617			self.nm.register_atfm_regulation(reg)
 618
 619	def create_atfm_at_airports(self):
 620		if self.sc.manual_airport_regulations is not None:
 621			self.define_regulations_airport(self.sc.df_dregs_airports_manual,
 622											self.sc.regulations_day_manual)
 623
 624		if self.sc.regulations_day_all is not None:
 625			self.define_regulations_airport(self.sc.df_dregs_airports_all,
 626											self.sc.regulations_day_all)
 627
 628	def create_airports(self):
 629		df = self.sc.df_airport_data
 630		df_m_dcap = self.sc.df_airports_modif_data_due_cap
 631		df_m_dcap = df_m_dcap.set_index('icao_id')['modif_cap_due_traffic_diff'].to_dict()
 632
 633		pouet = self.sc.df_mtt.groupby(['airport_size', 'wake']).mean()
 634		dic_mtt = {size: {wake: {typ: pouet.loc[size].loc[wake][typ]
 635				for typ in pouet.columns
 636						} for wake in set(pouet.index.get_level_values(1))
 637					} for size in set(pouet.index.get_level_values(0))
 638			}
 639
 640		self.airports_per_icao = {}  # keys are ICAO
 641
 642		for i, row in list(df.iterrows()):
 643			min_tt = self.sc.paras['airports__minimum_taxi_time']
 644
 645			# Capacity = declared arriva/dep capacity * modifier due to traffic different in sim than reality \
 646			#            * capacity_modifier depending on delay in simulation * reduction due to use arrival/demand capacity segregated
 647			airport_arrival_capacity = int(row['declared_capacity'] * df_m_dcap.get(row['icao_id'], 1.)
 648									* self.sc.dict_scn['capacity_modifier'] * self.sc.paras['airports__cap_ratio_mix_use_arrival_reduction'])
 649
 650			airport_departure_capacity = int(row['declared_capacity'] * df_m_dcap.get(row['icao_id'], 1.)
 651									* self.sc.dict_scn['capacity_modifier'] * self.sc.paras['airports__cap_ratio_mix_use_departure_reduction'])
 652
 653			airport = GroundAirport(self.postman,
 654							idd=i,
 655							uid=self.uid,
 656							icao=row['icao_id'],
 657							coords=(row['lat'], row['lon']),
 658							arrival_capacity=airport_arrival_capacity,
 659							departure_capacity=airport_departure_capacity,
 660							curfew=self.sc.dict_cf.get(row['icao_id'], None),
 661							exot=10.,
 662							env=self.env,
 663							min_tt=min_tt,
 664							mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__airport'],
 665							acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
 666							verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
 667							log_file=self.log_file_it,  # TODO: remove
 668							rs=self.rs,
 669							module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('GroundAirport', {}))
 670
 671			# Taxi out estimation
 672			mu, sig = row['mean_taxi_out'], row['std_taxi_out']
 673			mu, sig = mu*self.sc.dict_scn['taxi_time_modifier'], sig*self.sc.dict_scn['taxi_time_modifier']
 674			if sig == 0.:
 675				sig = 1.
 676
 677			scale, s = scale_and_s_from_mean_sigma_lognorm(mu-min_tt, sig)
 678			if scale < 0. or s < 0.:
 679				print('PROBLEM:', row['icao_id'], scale, s)
 680			dists = lognorm(loc=min_tt, scale=scale, s=s)
 681			airport.give_taxi_out_time_estimation_dist(dists)
 682
 683			# Taxi in estimation
 684			mu, sig = row['mean_taxi_in'], row['std_taxi_in']
 685			mu, sig = mu*self.sc.dict_scn['taxi_time_modifier'], sig*self.sc.dict_scn['taxi_time_modifier']
 686			if sig == 0.:
 687				sig = 1.
 688
 689			scale, s = scale_and_s_from_mean_sigma_lognorm(mu-min_tt, sig)
 690			dists = lognorm(loc=min_tt, scale=scale, s=s)
 691			airport.give_taxi_in_time_estimation_dist(dists)
 692
 693			# Changes to taxi in/out estimation
 694			dists = norm(loc=0., scale=self.sc.paras['airports__taxi_estimation_scale'])
 695			airport.give_taxi_time_add_dist(dists)
 696
 697			# Turnaround times`
 698			dists = {k: {kk: expon(loc=vv, scale=self.sc.dict_scn['lambda_tat'])
 699							for kk, vv in v.items()}
 700						for k, v in dic_mtt[row['size']].items()}
 701			airport.give_turnaround_time_dists(dists)
 702
 703			# Connecting times
 704			mct_q = self.sc.paras['airports__mct_q']
 705			mcts = {'N-N': row['MCT_domestic'],
 706					'I-I': row['MCT_international'],
 707					'N-I': row['MCT_standard']}
 708
 709			sig_ct = self.sc.paras['airports__sig_ct']
 710			dists = {'economy': {}, 'flex': {}}
 711			for k, mct in mcts.items():
 712				scale, s = scale_and_s_from_quantile_sigma_lognorm(mct_q, mct, sig_ct)
 713				dists['economy'][k] = lognorm(loc=0., scale=scale, s=s)
 714				dists['flex'][k] = lognorm(loc=0., scale=scale, s=s)
 715
 716			airport.give_connecting_time_dist(dists, mct_q=mct_q)
 717			self.airports_per_icao[row['icao_id']] = airport
 718
 719			self.cr.register_mcts(airport)
 720			self.uid += 1
 721
 722		self.airports = {airport.uid: airport for airport in self.airports_per_icao.values()}
 723
 724	def create_AMANs(self):
 725		self.eamans = {}
 726		for i, row in self.sc.df_eaman_data.iterrows():
 727			if self.airports_per_icao.get(row['icao_id'], None) is not None:
 728				eaman = EAMAN(self.postman,
 729							idd=i,
 730							env=self.env,
 731							uid=self.uid,
 732							planning_horizon=row['planning_horizon_nm'],
 733							execution_horizon=row['execution_horizon_nm'],
 734							max_holding_minutes=self.sc.paras.get('eaman__max_holding_minutes'),
 735							solver=self.sc.paras['eaman__solver'],
 736							slot_planning_oversubscription=self.sc.paras.get('eaman__eaman_slot_planning_oversubscription', 0),
 737							mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__eaman'],
 738							acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
 739							verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
 740							log_file=self.log_file_it,
 741							rs=self.rs,
 742							module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('EAMAN', {}),
 743							**self.module_agent_paras.get('EAMAN', {})
 744							  )
 745				eaman.reference_dt = self.sc.reference_dt
 746				eaman.build()
 747				# regulations_at_airport = self.nm.atfm_regulations.get(self.airports_per_icao[row['icao_id']].uid,None)
 748
 749				self.cr.register_agent(eaman)
 750				eaman.register_airport(airport=self.airports_per_icao[row['icao_id']])  # ,regulations=regulations_at_airport)
 751				eaman.register_radar(radar=self.radar)
 752				self.airports_per_icao[row['icao_id']].register_eaman(eaman=eaman)
 753				self.eamans[eaman.uid] = eaman
 754				self.uid += 1
 755
 756		idx = len(self.sc.df_eaman_data)
 757
 758		# For all the airports which do not have an EAMAN, create a stupid one.
 759		for icao, airport in self.airports_per_icao.items():
 760			if ('eaman_uid' not in airport.__dict__.keys()) or (airport.eaman_uid is None):
 761				eaman = AMAN(self.postman,
 762							idd=idx,
 763							env=self.env,
 764							uid=self.uid,
 765							execution_horizon=self.sc.paras['eaman__default_horizon'],
 766							mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__eaman'],
 767							acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
 768							verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
 769							log_file=self.log_file_it,
 770							module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('AMAN', {}))
 771				eaman.build()
 772				regulations_at_airport = self.nm.atfm_regulations.get(self.airports_per_icao[icao].uid, None)
 773
 774				self.cr.register_agent(eaman)
 775				eaman.register_airport(airport=airport)  # ,regulations=regulations_at_airport)
 776				eaman.register_radar(radar=self.radar)
 777				airport.register_eaman(eaman=eaman)
 778				self.eamans[eaman.uid] = eaman
 779				self.uid += 1
 780				idx += 1
 781

 791						acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],

 793						log_file=self.log_file_it,

 795						module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('DMAN', {}))
 796

 798			airport.register_dman(dman=dman)
 799			self.dmans[dman.uid] = dman
 800			self.uid += 1

 802	def create_AOCs_and_alliances(self):
 803
 804		self.aocs, self.aocs_uid, self.alliances = {}, {}, {}
 805		for i, row in self.sc.df_airlines_data.iterrows():
 806			# print('Creating AOC:', row['ICAO'])
 807			# Apply module modification pertaining only to this agent
 808			this_agent = 'AirlineOperatingCentre'
 809			module_agent_modif = deepcopy(self.module_agent_modif.get(this_agent, {}))
 810			mspecss = self.module_agent_modif_post.get(this_agent, {})
 811
 812			for mspecs in mspecss:
 813				if row['ICAO'] in mspecs['apply_to'][this_agent]:
 814					for agent, role_modif in mspecs.get('agent_modif', {}).items():
 815						if agent == this_agent:
 816							for role, modif in role_modif.items():
 817								if role != 'on_init':
 818									if role not in module_agent_modif.keys():
 819										module_agent_modif[role] = {}
 820
 821									for met1, met2 in modif.items():
 822										if met1 != 'on_init':
 823											module_agent_modif[role][met1] = met2
 824										else:
 825											module_agent_modif[role][met1] = module_agent_modif[role].get(met1, []) + [met2]
 826								else:  # this is for on_init at the agent level
 827									module_agent_modif['on_init'] = self.module_agent_modif[agent].get('on_init', []) + [modif]
 828			
 829			aoc = AirlineOperatingCentre(self.postman,
 830										icao=row['ICAO'],
 831										env=self.env,
 832										idd=i,
 833										uid=self.uid,
 834										series_id=self.paras['series_id'],
 835										p_cancellation=self.sc.paras['airlines__p_cancellation'],
 836										airline_type=row['AO_type'],
 837										compensation_uptake=self.sc.paras['airlines__compensation_uptake'],
 838										delay_estimation_lag=self.sc.paras['airlines__delay_estimation_lag'],
 839										compute_fp_using_pool=self.sc.paras['flight_plans__compute_fp_using_pool'],
 840										mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__aoc'],
 841										acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
 842										verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
 843										log_file=self.log_file_it,
 844										rs=self.rs,
 845										fuel_price=self.sc.paras['airlines__fuel_price'],
 846										smoothness_fp=self.sc.paras['airlines__smoothness_fp'],
 847										fp_anchor=self.sc.paras['airlines__fp_anchor'],
 848										threshold_swap=self.sc.paras['airlines__threshold_swap'],
 849										heuristic_knock_on_factor=self.sc.paras['airlines__heuristic_knock_on_factor'],
 850										dict_curfew_nonpax_cost=self.sc.dict_curfew_nonpax_costs,
 851										dict_curfew_estimated_pax_avg_costs=self.sc.dict_curfew_estimated_pax_avg_costs,
 852										cancel_cascade_curfew=self.sc.paras['airlines__cancel_cascade_curfew'],
 853										slow_down_th=self.sc.paras['airlines__slow_down_th'],
 854										max_extra_fuel_used=self.sc.paras['airlines__max_extra_fuel_used'],
 855										remove_shorter_route_calibration=self.sc.paras['airlines__remove_shorter_route_calibration'],
 856										dci_min_delay=self.sc.paras['airlines__dci_min_delay'],
 857										dci_max_delay=self.sc.paras['airlines__dci_max_delay'],
 858										dci_p_bias=self.sc.paras['airlines__dci_p_bias'],
 859										wait_for_passenger_thr=self.sc.paras['airlines__wait_for_passenger_thr'],
 860										module_agent_modif=module_agent_modif,
 861										reference_dt=self.sc.reference_dt,
 862										min_time_for_FP_recomputation=self.sc.paras['airlines__min_time_for_FP_recomputation'])
 863			self.uid += 1 
 864			dist = expon(loc=self.sc.paras['airlines__non_ATFM_delay_loc'],
 865						scale=self.sc.dict_scn['non_ATFM_delay_lambda'])
 866
 867			aoc.give_delay_distr(dist)
 868
 869			self.aocs[row['ICAO']] = aoc
 870			self.aocs_uid[aoc.uid] = aoc
 871
 872			aoc.register_nm(self.nm)
 873			self.nm.register_airline(aoc)
 874
 875			# Duty of care
 876			df = self.sc.df_doc.copy()
 877			if row['AO_type'] == 'FSC':
 878				df['economy'] = df['base']
 879				df['flex'] = (df['high'] + df['base'])/2.
 880			else:
 881				df['economy'] = (df['base'] + df['low'])/2.
 882				df['flex'] = (df['base'] + df['base'])/2.
 883
 884			doc_func = build_step_multi_valued_function(df,
 885														add_lower_bound=0.,
 886														columns=['economy', 'flex'])
 887
 888			aoc.give_duty_of_care_func(doc_func)
 889
 890			# Compensation
 891			compensation_func = build_step_bivariate_function(self.sc.df_compensation,
 892															add_lower_bound2=0.)
 893
 894			aoc.give_compensation_func(compensation_func)
 895
 896			# Cost of delay (maintenance/crew)
 897			aoc.give_non_pax_cost_delay(self.sc.dict_np_cost[row['AO_type']],
 898										self.sc.dict_np_cost_fit[row['AO_type']])
 899
 900			# TODO: only register relevant airports!
 901			for airport in self.airports_per_icao.values():
 902				aoc.register_airport(airport)
 903
 904			# TODO: only register relevant fp for this given AOC
 905			aoc.register_fp_pool(self.fp_pool)
 906
 907			if not row['alliance'] in self.alliances.keys():
 908				alliance = Alliance(uid=self.uid, icao=row['alliance'])
 909				self.cr.register_alliance(alliance)
 910				self.alliances[row['alliance']] = alliance
 911				self.uid += 1
 912
 913			self.alliances[row['alliance']].register_airline(aoc)
 914
 915	def create_flights(self):
 916		self.flights = {} # keys are IFPS here !!!
 917		self.flights_uid = {} # keys are uids.
 918		self.aircraft = {}
 919
 920		for i, row in self.sc.df_schedules.iterrows():
 921			if (row['registration'] is None) or (row['registration'] == '') or pd.isnull(row['registration']):
 922				row['registration'] = self.uid
 923			if not row['registration'] in self.aircraft.keys():
 924				aircraft = Aircraft(self.env,
 925										idd=i,
 926										uid=self.uid,
 927										registration = row['registration'],
 928										seats=row['max_seats'],
 929										ac_type=row['aircraft_type'],
 930										bada_code_ac_model=self.sc.dict_ac_bada_code_ac_model[row['aircraft_type']],
 931										bada_code_ac_model_ac_eq=self.sc.dict_ac_bada_code_ac_model_with_ac_eq[row['aircraft_type']],
 932										rs=self.rs)
 933				if aircraft.bada_code_ac_model is None:
 934					aprint("Aircraft performances missing for ", row['aircraft_type'])
 935					raise Exception()
 936
 937
 938				aircraft.bada_performances = self.sc.dict_ac_model_perf.get(aircraft.bada_code_ac_model,
 939																				self.sc.dict_ac_model_perf.get(aircraft.bada_code_ac_model,
 940																													 self.sc.dict_ac_model_perf.get(aircraft.bada_code_ac_model_ac_eq)))
 941
 942				if aircraft.bada_performances is None:
 943					aprint("Aircraft BADA performances missing for ", aircraft.bada_code_ac_model)
 944					raise Exception()
 945
 946				aircraft.wtc = aircraft.bada_performances.wtc
 947
 948				self.aircraft[row['registration']] = aircraft
 949				self.uid += 1
 950			else:
 951				aircraft = self.aircraft[row['registration']]
 952
 953			airport_curfew = self.airports_per_icao[row['destination']].curfew
 954			curfew_flight = None
 955			if airport_curfew is not None:
 956				curfew_flight = dt.datetime.combine(row['sibt'].date(), airport_curfew)
 957				# THESE TWO LINES NEED TO BE PUT BACK TO WORK AFTER TESTING WITH CURFEW DONE
 958				if row['sibt'].time() > airport_curfew:
 959					curfew_flight += dt.timedelta(days=1)
 960
 961				curfew_flight = (curfew_flight-self.sc.reference_dt).total_seconds()/60.
 962			else:
 963				curfew_flight = 9999999999999999
 964
 965			thisone = False
 966			flight = Flight(self.postman,
 967							sobt=(row['sobt']-self.sc.reference_dt).total_seconds()/60.,
 968							sibt=(row['sibt']-self.sc.reference_dt).total_seconds()/60.,
 969							env=self.env,
 970							idd=int(row['nid']),
 971							uid=self.uid,
 972							origin_airport_uid=self.airports_per_icao[row['origin']].uid,
 973							destination_airport_uid=self.airports_per_icao[row['destination']].uid,
 974							nm_uid=self.nm.uid,
 975							ac_uid=aircraft.uid,
 976							aircraft=aircraft,
 977							prob_climb_extra=self.sc.prob_climb_extra.copy(),
 978							extra_climb_tweak=self.sc.dict_scn['extra_climb_tweak'],
 979							prob_cruise_extra=self.sc.prob_cruise_extra.copy(),
 980							dist_extra_cruise_if_dci=self.sc.dist_extra_cruise_if_dci.copy(),
 981							use_trajectory_uncertainty = self.sc.paras['flights__use_trajectory_uncertainty'],
 982							# use_wind_uncertainty = self.sc.paras['flights__use_wind_uncertainty'],
 983							wind_uncertainty = self.sc.paras['flights__wind_uncertainty'],
 984							wind_uncertainty_consistency = self.sc.paras['flights__wind_uncertainty_consistency'],
 985							mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__flight'],
 986							acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
 987							verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
 988							log_file=self.log_file_it,
 989							default_holding_altitude=self.sc.paras['flights__default_holding_altitude'],
 990							default_holding_ff=self.sc.paras['flights__default_holding_ff'],
 991							curfew=curfew_flight,
 992							can_propagate_to_curfew=(int(row['nid']) in self.sc.l_ids_propagate_to_curfew),
 993							exclude=row.get('exclude', None),
 994							rs=self.rs,
 995							thisone=thisone,
 996							module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('Flight', {}),
 997							callsign=row.get('callsign', None))
 998			self.uid += 1
 999			self.flights[int(row['nid'])] = flight
1000			self.flights_uid[flight.uid] = flight
1001
1002			aoc = self.aocs[row['airline']]
1003
1004			aoc.register_aircraft(aircraft)
1005			aoc.register_flight(flight)
1006
1007		# print('Number of flights', len(self.flights))
1008		for aoc in self.aocs.values():
1009			self.cr.register_airline(aoc)
1010
1011	def create_pax(self):
1012		self.paxs = []
1013		for i, row in self.sc.df_pax_data.iterrows():
1014			it = [self.flights[int(row['leg1'])]]
1015			if not pd.isnull(row['leg2']):
1016				it += [self.flights[int(row['leg2'])]]
1017			if not pd.isnull(row['leg3']):
1018				it += [self.flights[int(row['leg3'])]]
1019
1020			airlines = set([self.aocs[f.aoc_info['ao_icao']] for f in it])
1021
1022			ticket_type = str(row['ticket_type'])
1023			pax = PaxItineraryGroup(n_pax=int(row['pax']),
1024									pax_type=ticket_type,
1025									idd=i,
1026									origin_uid=it[0].origin_airport_uid,
1027									destination_uid=it[-1].destination_airport_uid,
1028									fare=row['avg_fare'],
1029									dic_soft_cost=self.sc.dic_soft_cost,
1030									rs=self.rs)
1031
1032			pax.give_itinerary([f.uid for f in it])
1033			for airline in airlines:
1034				airline.register_pax_itinerary_group(pax)
1035			self.paxs.append(pax)

1037	def dump_all_results(self, n_iter, connection, profile, save_path):
1038		with clock_time(message_before='Dumping everything...',
1039						oneline=False,
1040						print_function=mmprint):
1041
1042			paras_written = False
1043
1044			for output in self.paras['outputs_handling__outputs']:
1045				stuff = output.split('output_')[-1]
1046
1047				data = None
1048				try:
1049					data = getattr(self, 'df_'+stuff)
1050				except:
1051					pass
1052
1053				if data is not None:
1054					for p in self.paras['outputs_handling__paras_to_keep_in_output']:
1055						if p != 'scenario':
1056							data[p] = [self.sc.paras[p]] * len(data)
1057
1058					if connection['type'] == 'mysql':
1059
1060						# TODO: include paras to keep in output to index!!!
1061						primary_dict = self.create_primary_keys(stuff)
1062
1063						write_data(fmt='mysql',
1064									data=data,
1065									table_name=output,
1066									primary_dict=primary_dict,
1067									how=profile['mode'],
1068									use_temp_csv=profile['use_temp_csv'],
1069									connection=connection,
1070									keys_for_update={'scenario_id': self.sc.paras['scenario'],
1071													'n_iter': self.n_iter,
1072													'model_version': model_version},
1073									hard_update=True,
1074									index={'index_scenario': ['scenario_id'],
1075											'index_scenario_iter': ['scenario_id', 'n_iter']})
1076
1077					if connection['type'] == 'file':
1078						file_name = output + str('.csv.gz')
1079
1080						write_data(fmt=profile['fmt'],
1081									data=data,
1082									path=save_path,
1083									file_name=file_name,
1084									connection=connection,
1085									how=profile['mode'])
1086
1087						if not paras_written:
1088							write_data(fmt='pickle',
1089									data=self.sc.paras,
1090									path=save_path,
1091									file_name='paras.pic',
1092									connection=connection,
1093									how=profile['mode'])
1094							
1095							paras_written = True
1096
1097						if self.paras['outputs_handling__save_all_hotspot_data'] is None:
1098							for reg_uid, v in self.hotspot_data.items():
1099								for stuff, vv in v.items():
1100									with open(connection['base_path'] / '{}_{}.pic'.format(reg_uid, stuff), 'wb') as f:
1101										pickle.dump(vv, f)
1102
1103		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes

1105	def create_primary_keys(self, name=None):
1106		primary_dict = OrderedDict()
1107		if name == 'flight':
1108			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1109			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1110			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1111			primary_dict['uid'] = 'INT'
1112		elif name == 'general_simulation':
1113			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1114			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1115			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1116		elif name == 'pax':
1117			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1118			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1119			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1120			primary_dict['id'] = 'INT'
1121		elif name == 'swap':
1122			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1123			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1124			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1125			primary_dict['flight1_uid'] = 'INT'
1126			primary_dict['id_swap'] = 'INT'
1127		elif name == 'eaman':
1128			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1129			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1130			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1131			primary_dict['uid'] = 'INT'
1132		elif name == 'dci':
1133			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1134			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1135			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1136			primary_dict['flight_uid'] = 'INT'
1137			primary_dict['dci_check_timestamp'] = 'VARCHAR(50)'
1138		elif name == 'wfp':
1139			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1140			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1141			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1142			primary_dict['flight_uid'] = 'INT'
1143		elif name == 'message':
1144			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1145			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1146			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1147		elif name == 'event':
1148			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1149			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1150			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1151		elif name == 'RNG':
1152			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1153			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1154			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1155
1156		return primary_dict

1162	def freeze_RNG(self):
1163		self.frozen_RNG = self.rs.get_state()
1164		self.frozen_RNG = np.array((self.frozen_RNG[0], str(list(self.frozen_RNG[1])), self.frozen_RNG[2], self.frozen_RNG[3], self.frozen_RNG[4]))

1166	def get_all_metrics(self):
1167		if not self.skipping_computation:
1168			with clock_time(message_before='Getting RNG state...',
1169							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1170				self.get_RNG()
1171
1172			# Call get_eaman before get_flight as get_flight needs to merge
1173			# with eaman result dataframe.
1174			with clock_time(message_before='Getting eaman metrics...',
1175							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1176				self.get_eaman_metrics()  
1177
1178			with clock_time(message_before='Getting flight metrics...',
1179							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1180				self.get_flight_metrics()
1181
1182			with clock_time(message_before='Getting pax metrics...',
1183							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1184				self.get_pax_group_metrics()
1185
1186			with clock_time(message_before='Getting hotspot metrics...',
1187							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1188				self.get_hotspot_metrics()
1189
1190			with clock_time(message_before='Getting detailed hotspot data...',
1191							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1192				self.get_detailed_hotspot_data()
1193
1194			with clock_time(message_before='Getting general simulation metrics...',
1195							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1196				self.get_general_simulation_results()
1197			
1198			with clock_time(message_before='Getting dci metrics...',
1199							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1200				self.get_dci_metrics()
1201			
1202			with clock_time(message_before='Getting wfp metrics...',
1203							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1204				self.get_wfp_metrics()
1205
1206			with clock_time(message_before='Getting message metrics...',
1207							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1208				if self.paras['debug__count_messages']:
1209					self.get_message_metrics()
1210				else:
1211					self.df_messages = None
1212
1213			with clock_time(message_before='Getting event metrics...',
1214							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1215				if self.paras['debug__count_events']:
1216					self.get_event_metrics()
1217				else:
1218					self.df_events = None
1219
1220			with clock_time(message_before='Getting module metrics...',
1221							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1222				self.get_module_metrics()
1223			
1224			mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes

1357						'exot', 'exit', 'axot', 'axit',

1371						'reactionary_delay', 'departure_delay', 'arrival_delay'
1372						]:
1373					met = 'get_' + k
1374					pouet[k].append(getattr(f.fpip, met)())
1375				elif k in ['pax_on_board', 'pax_to_board_initial']:
1376					aoc_uid = f.aoc_info['aoc_uid']
1377					n_pax = np.array([pax.n_pax for pax in self.aocs_uid[aoc_uid].aoc_flights_info[f.uid][k]]).sum()
1378					pouet[k].append(n_pax)
1379				elif k in ['sobt', 'sibt']:
1380					time = getattr(f, k)
1381					if time is not None:
1382						time = self.sc.reference_dt + dt.timedelta(minutes=time)
1383					pouet[k].append(time)
1384				elif k in ['ao_icao', 'aoc_uid', 'ao_type']:
1385					pouet[k].append(getattr(f, 'aoc_info')[k])
1386				elif k == 'origin':
1387					icao = self.airports[f.origin_airport_uid].icao
1388					pouet[k].append(icao)
1389				elif k == 'destination':
1390					icao = self.airports[f.destination_airport_uid].icao
1391					pouet[k].append(icao)
1392				elif k in ['DOC', 'soft_cost', 'transfer_cost', 'compensation_cost', 'non_pax_cost', 'non_pax_curfew_cost']:
1393					aoc_uid = f.aoc_info['aoc_uid']
1394					pouet[k].append(round(self.aocs_uid[aoc_uid].aoc_flights_info[f.uid][k], 2))
1395				elif k in ['main_reason_delay', 'pax_to_board_initial', 'pax_on_board']:
1396					aoc_uid = f.aoc_info['aoc_uid']
1397					pouet[k].append(self.aocs_uid[aoc_uid].aoc_flights_info[f.uid][k])
1398				else:
1399					pouet[k].append(getattr(f, k))
1400
1401		self.df_flights = pd.DataFrame(pouet)
1402		self.df_flights['scenario_id'] = [self.sc.scenario] * len(self.df_flights)
1403		self.df_flights['case_study_id'] = [int(self.sc.case_study_conf['info']['case_study_id'])] * len(self.df_flights)
1404		self.df_flights['n_iter'] = [self.n_iter]*len(self.df_flights)
1405		self.df_flights['model_version'] = [model_version]*len(self.df_flights)
1406		self.df_flights.rename(columns=to_get, inplace=True)
1407
1408		df_eaman_with_planning = self.df_eaman[~self.df_eaman['eaman_planned_assigned_delay'].isnull()].copy()  # if null no arrival to eaman
1409		
1410		self.df_flights = self.df_flights.merge(df_eaman_with_planning[['uid',
1411																		'eaman_planned_assigned_delay',
1412																		'eaman_planned_absorbed_air',
1413																		'eaman_tactical_assigned_delay']],
1414												on='uid',
1415												how='left')
1416		
1417		self.df_flights['eaman_extra_arrival_tactical_delay'] = self.df_flights['eaman_planned_absorbed_air']+self.df_flights['eaman_tactical_assigned_delay']-self.df_flights['eaman_planned_assigned_delay']
1418		self.df_flights['eaman_diff_tact_planned_delay_assigned'] = self.df_flights['eaman_tactical_assigned_delay']-self.df_flights['eaman_planned_assigned_delay']
1419
1420		arrival_parameters = ['eaman_planned_assigned_delay', 'eaman_planned_absorbed_air', 'eaman_tactical_assigned_delay', 'eaman_extra_arrival_tactical_delay', 'eaman_diff_tact_planned_delay_assigned']
1421
1422		self.df_flights = self.df_flights[['scenario_id', 'case_study_id', 'n_iter', 'model_version']+list(to_get.values())+arrival_parameters]
1423
1424	def get_dci_metrics(self):
1425		to_get = OrderedDict()
1426		to_get['uid'] = 'flight_uid'
1427
1428		to_get['origin'] = 'origin'
1429		to_get['destination'] = 'destination'
1430
1431		to_get['dci_check_timestamp'] = 'dci_check_timestamp'
1432		to_get['estimated_delay'] = 'estimated_delay'
1433		to_get['recovering_delay'] = 'recovering_delay'
1434		to_get['perc_selected'] = 'perc_selected'
1435		to_get['dfuel'] = 'dfuel'
1436		to_get['extra_fuel_available'] = 'extra_fuel_available'
1437		to_get['recoverable_delay'] = 'recoverable_delay'
1438
1439		pouet = {}
1440		for k, v in to_get.items():
1441			pouet[k] = []
1442			for f in self.flights.values():
1443				decisions = getattr(f.fpip, 'get_dci_decisions')()
1444				if decisions is not None:
1445					num_dci_check_points = len(decisions)  # how many times dci check was performed
1446				else:
1447					num_dci_check_points = None
1448				if (k == 'origin') and (num_dci_check_points is not None):
1449					icao = self.airports[f.origin_airport_uid].icao
1450					pouet[k] += [icao] * num_dci_check_points
1451				elif (k == 'destination') and (num_dci_check_points is not None):
1452					icao = self.airports[f.destination_airport_uid].icao
1453					pouet[k] += [icao] * num_dci_check_points
1454				elif k in ['dci_check_timestamp', 'estimated_delay',
1455						   'recovering_delay', 'perc_selected', 'dfuel',
1456						   'extra_fuel_available', 'recoverable_delay']:
1457					dci_info_list = getattr(f.fpip, 'get_dci_decisions')()  # list of dictionaries
1458
1459					if num_dci_check_points is not None:
1460						for dci_check_point in dci_info_list:
1461							pouet[k].append(dci_check_point[k])
1462							# for every
1463				else:
1464					if num_dci_check_points is not None:
1465						pouet[k] += [getattr(f, k)] * num_dci_check_points
1466
1467		self.df_dci = pd.DataFrame(pouet)
1468		self.df_dci['scenario_id'] = [self.sc.scenario]*len(self.df_dci)
1469		self.df_dci['n_iter'] = [self.n_iter]*len(self.df_dci)
1470		self.df_dci['model_version'] = [model_version]*len(self.df_dci)
1471		self.df_dci.rename(columns=to_get, inplace=True)
1472
1473		self.df_dci = self.df_dci[['scenario_id', 'n_iter', 'model_version']+list(to_get.values())]
1474
1475	def get_wfp_metrics(self):
1476		to_get = OrderedDict()
1477		to_get['uid'] = 'flight_uid'
1478
1479		to_get['origin'] = 'origin'
1480		to_get['destination'] = 'destination'
1481
1482		to_get['num_missing_pax_groups'] = 'num_missing_pax_groups'
1483		to_get['wait_time_min'] = 'wait_time_min'
1484		to_get['wait_time_max'] = 'wait_time_max'
1485		to_get['wait_time_chosen'] = 'wait_time_chosen'
1486
1487		pouet = {}
1488		for k, v in to_get.items():
1489			pouet[k] = []
1490			for f in self.flights.values():
1491				wfp_info = getattr(f.fpip, 'get_wfp_decisions')()  # list of dictionaries, here only 1 cause atm one decision point per flight
1492				if wfp_info is not None:
1493					if k == 'origin':
1494						icao = self.airports[f.origin_airport_uid].icao
1495						pouet[k] += [icao]
1496					elif k == 'destination':
1497						icao = self.airports[f.destination_airport_uid].icao
1498						pouet[k] += [icao]
1499					elif k in ['num_missing_pax_groups', 'wait_time_min',
1500							   'wait_time_max', 'wait_time_chosen']:
1501						if len(wfp_info) > 0:
1502							pouet[k].append(wfp_info[0][k]) # [0] due to the fact it's always the first dictionary
1503						else: # no wfp was ever even considered? --> wfp_info is an empty list
1504							pouet[k].append(None)
1505					else:
1506						pouet[k] += [getattr(f, k)]
1507
1508		self.df_wfp = pd.DataFrame(pouet)
1509		self.df_wfp['scenario_id'] = [self.sc.scenario]*len(self.df_wfp)

1512		# self.df_wfp['n_airports'] = [self.paras['n_airports']]*len(self.df_wfp)
1513		self.df_wfp.rename(columns=to_get, inplace=True)
1514
1515		self.df_wfp = self.df_wfp[['scenario_id', 'n_iter', 'model_version']+list(to_get.values())]

1557	def get_pax_group_metrics(self):
1558		to_get = OrderedDict()
1559		to_get['id'] = 'id'
1560		to_get['original_id'] = 'original_id'
1561		to_get['n_pax'] = 'n_pax'
1562		to_get['original_n_pax'] = 'original_n_pax'
1563		to_get['pax_type'] = 'pax_type'
1564		to_get['fare'] = 'fare'
1565		to_get['origin_uid'] = 'origin_uid'
1566		to_get['destination_uid'] = 'destination_uid'
1567		to_get['time_at_gate'] = 'time_at_gate'
1568		to_get['compensation'] = 'compensation'
1569		to_get['duty_of_care'] = 'duty_of_care'
1570		to_get['initial_sobt'] = 'initial_sobt'
1571		to_get['final_sibt'] = 'final_sibt'
1572		to_get['initial_aobt'] = 'initial_aobt'
1573		to_get['final_aibt'] = 'final_aibt'
1574		to_get['itinerary'] = 'itinerary'
1575		to_get['original_itinerary'] = 'original_itinerary'
1576		to_get['modified_itinerary'] = 'modified_itinerary'
1577		to_get['tot_arrival_delay'] = 'tot_arrival_delay'
1578		to_get['connecting_pax'] = 'connecting_pax'
1579		to_get['final_destination_reached'] = 'final_destination_reached'
1580
1581		# all_paxs = self.paxs + [new_pax for pax in self.paxs for new_pax in pax.clones]
1582		all_paxs = self.paxs + [new_pax for aoc in self.aocs.values() for new_pax in aoc.new_paxs]
1583		max_id = max([pax.id for pax in self.paxs])
1584
1585		pouet = {k: np.full(len(all_paxs), None) for k in to_get.keys()}
1586		pouet['origin'] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1587		pouet['destination'] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1588		added_rows = []
1589		for k, v in to_get.items():
1590			for j, pax in enumerate(all_paxs):
1591				if k == 'itinerary':
1592					# Get legs
1593					for i, uid in enumerate(pax.itinerary):
1594						met = 'leg' + str(i+1)
1595						if met not in pouet.keys():
1596							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1597							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1598						pouet[met][j] = self.flights_uid[uid].id
1599
1600					# Get connecting times
1601					for i, uid in enumerate(pax.itinerary[:-1]):
1602						met = 'leg' + str(i+1) + '_ct'
1603						if met not in pouet.keys():
1604							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1605							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1606						if (not pax.aobts[i+1] is None) and (not pax.aibts[i] is None):
1607							pouet[met][j] = pax.aobts[i+1] - pax.aibts[i]
1608						else:
1609							pouet[met][j] = None
1610
1611					# Get airports
1612					airports = [self.flights_uid[flight].origin_airport_uid for flight in pax.itinerary]
1613					if len(pax.itinerary) > 0:
1614						airports.append(self.flights_uid[pax.itinerary[-1]].destination_airport_uid)
1615					airports = [self.airports[airport].icao for airport in airports]
1616					for i, airport in enumerate(airports):
1617						met = 'airport' + str(i+1)
1618						if met not in pouet.keys():
1619							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1620							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1621						pouet[met][j] = airport
1622
1623					# Get airlines
1624					airlines = [self.flights_uid[flight].aoc_info['ao_icao'] for flight in pax.itinerary]
1625					for i, airline in enumerate(airlines):
1626						met = 'airline' + str(i+1)
1627						if met not in pouet.keys():
1628							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1629							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1630						pouet[met][j] = airline
1631
1632				elif k == 'original_itinerary':
1633					# Get legs
1634					for i, uid in enumerate(pax.get_original_itinerary()):
1635						met = 'leg' + str(i+1) + '_sch'
1636						if met not in pouet.keys():
1637							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1638							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1639						pouet[met][j] = self.flights_uid[uid].id
1640
1641					# Get connecting times
1642					for i, uid in enumerate(pax.get_original_itinerary()[:-1]):
1643						met = 'leg' + str(i+1) + '_sch_ct'
1644						if met not in pouet.keys():
1645							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1646							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1647						pouet[met][j] = pax.sobts[i+1] - pax.sibts[i]
1648
1649					# Get airports
1650					airports = [self.flights_uid[flight].origin_airport_uid for flight in pax.get_original_itinerary()]
1651					airports.append(self.flights_uid[pax.get_original_itinerary()[-1]].destination_airport_uid)
1652					airports = [self.airports[airport].icao for airport in airports]
1653					for i, airport in enumerate(airports):
1654						met = 'airport' + str(i+1) + '_sch'
1655						if met not in pouet.keys():
1656							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1657							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1658						pouet[met][j] = airport
1659
1660					# Get airlines
1661					airlines = [self.flights_uid[flight].aoc_info['ao_icao'] for flight in pax.get_original_itinerary()]
1662					for i, airline in enumerate(airlines):
1663						met = 'airline' + str(i+1)
1664						if met not in pouet.keys():
1665							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1666							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1667						pouet[met][j] = airline
1668
1669				elif k in ['initial_sobt', 'final_sibt', 'initial_aobt', 'final_aibt', 'time_at_gate']:
1670					try:
1671						time = getattr(pax, k)
1672					except:
1673						print(pax)
1674						raise
1675					if time is not None:
1676						time = self.sc.reference_dt + dt.timedelta(minutes=time)
1677					pouet[k][j] = time
1678				elif k == 'origin_uid':
1679					pouet[k][j] = getattr(pax, k)
1680					icao = self.airports[pax.origin_uid].icao
1681					pouet['origin'][j] = icao
1682				elif k == 'destination_uid':
1683					pouet[k][j] = getattr(pax, k)
1684					icao = self.airports[pax.destination_uid].icao
1685					pouet['destination'][j] = icao
1686				else:
1687					pouet[k][j] = getattr(pax, k)
1688
1689		self.df_pax = pd.DataFrame(pouet)
1690		self.df_pax['scenario_id'] = [self.sc.scenario]*len(self.df_pax)
1691		self.df_pax['case_study_id'] = [int(self.sc.case_study_conf['info']['case_study_id'])] * len(self.df_pax)
1692		self.df_pax['n_iter'] = [self.n_iter]*len(self.df_pax)
1693		self.df_pax['model_version'] = [model_version]*len(self.df_pax)
1694		self.df_pax.rename(columns=to_get, inplace=True)
1695		self.df_pax.drop(columns=['itinerary'], inplace=True)
1696
1697		rows_dict = list(to_get.values())
1698		rows_dict.remove('itinerary')
1699		rows_dict.remove('original_itinerary')
1700		self.df_pax = self.df_pax[['scenario_id', 'case_study_id', 'n_iter', 'model_version']+rows_dict+added_rows]

1702	def get_hotspot_metrics(self):
1703		dic = self.nm.hm.hotspot_metrics
1704
1705		dd = {}
1706		for reg_id, d in dic.items():
1707			cols = {}
1708			for col in d.keys():
1709				if not col in ['flights']:
1710					cols[col] = [d[col][flight_uid] for flight_uid in d['flights'] if flight_uid in d[col].keys()]
1711			cols['flights'] = d['flights']
1712
1713			dd[reg_id] = pd.DataFrame.from_dict(cols, orient='index').T.set_index('flights', inplace=False)
1714
1715		if len(dd) > 0:
1716			self.df_hotspot = pd.concat(dd)
1717
1718			self.df_hotspot['airlines'] = self.df_hotspot['airlines'].astype(int)
1719
1720			self.df_hotspot['scenario_id'] = [self.sc.scenario]*len(self.df_hotspot)
1721			self.df_hotspot['n_iter'] = [self.n_iter]*len(self.df_hotspot)
1722			self.df_hotspot['model_version'] = [model_version]*len(self.df_hotspot)
1723			self.df_hotspot.index.rename(['regulation', 'flights'], inplace=True)
1724		else:
1725			self.df_hotspot = pd.DataFrame()

1783	def prepare_everything(self):
1784		with clock_time(message_before='Preparing IP for simulation...',
1785						oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1786			self.cr.prepare_for_simulation(self.alliances.values())
1787
1788		for agent in self.agents:
1789			agent.prepare_for_simulation()
1790
1791		with clock_time(message_before='Preparing aircraft for simulation...',
1792						oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1793			[air.prepare_for_simulation(self.flights_uid, self.aocs_uid) for air in self.aircraft.values()]
1794
1795		with clock_time(message_before='Preparing pax for simulation...',
1796						oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):

1832	def run_world(self, n_iter):
1833		mmprint("Starting simulation at:", dt.datetime.now())
1834		with clock_time(message_after='Simulation executed in',
1835			print_function=mmprint):
1836
1837			print('Running simulation...')
1838			self.n_iter = n_iter
1839
1840			if self.paras['outputs_handling__insert_time_stamp']:
1841				self.timestamp_iteration = '_{}'.format(dt.datetime.now())
1842				self.add_path = '{}_{}{}'.format(model_version, self.sc.scenario, self.timestamp_iteration)
1843			else:
1844				self.add_path = '{}_{}_{}'.format(model_version, self.sc.scenario, self.n_iter)
1845
1846			self.skipping_computation = False
1847			for agent in self.aocs.values():
1848				agent.n_iter = n_iter
1849
1850			self.prepare_everything()
1851
1852			self.env.run()
1853
1854			self.finalise_everything()
1855
1856			mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
1857
1858			dic = {}
1859			normed = {}
1860			for aoc in self.aocs.values():
1861				for key, value in aoc.times.items():
1862					dic[key] = dic.get(key, dt.timedelta(0.)) + value
1863					normed[key] = len(self.aocs)
1864
1865			for flight in self.flights.values():
1866				for key, value in flight.times.items():
1867					dic[key] = dic.get(key, dt.timedelta(0.)) + value
1868					normed[key] = len(self.flights)
1869
1870			mmprint('CPU time per method:')
1871			for key, value in dic.items():
1872				mmprint(key, ':', value)
1873			mmprint()
1874			mmprint('CPU time per method (normalised):')
1875			for key, value in dic.items():
1876				mmprint(key, ':', value/normed[key])
1877			mmprint()
def trace(env, callback): 
50def trace(env, callback):
51	"""Replace the ``step()`` method of *env* with a tracing function
52	that calls *callbacks* with an events time, priority, ID and its
53	instance just before it is processed.
54
55	"""
56	def get_wrapper(env_step, callback):
57		"""Generate the wrapper for env.step()."""
58		@wraps(env_step)
59		def tracing_step():
60			"""Call *callback* for the next event if one exist before
61			calling ``env.step()``."""
62			if len(env._queue):
63				t, prio, eid, event = env._queue[0]
64				callback(t, prio, eid, event)
65			return env_step()
66
67		return tracing_step
68
69	env.step = get_wrapper(env.step, callback)

Replace the step() method of env with a tracing function that calls callbacks with an events time, priority, ID and its instance just before it is processed.

 265							else:

 495	def prepare_flight_plans(self):
 496		self.fp_pool = {}
 497		for (origin_icao, destination_icao, bada, _, _), fp in self.sc.dict_fp.items():
 498			O, D = self.airports_per_icao[origin_icao].uid, self.airports_per_icao[destination_icao].uid
 499
 500			fp.origin_airport_uid = O
 501			fp.destination_airport_uid = D
 502			fp.origin_icao = origin_icao
 503			fp.destination_icao = destination_icao
 504
 505			self.fp_pool[(O, D, bada)] = self.fp_pool.get((O, D, bada), []) + [fp]
 506
 507	def check_consistency(self):
 508		# Check that consecutive flights sharing the same aircraft land
 509		# and depart at the same airport.
 510
 511		for aircraft in self.aircraft.values():
 512			for i in range(0, len(aircraft.queue)-1):
 513				f1 = self.flights_uid[aircraft.queue[i].flight_uid]
 514				f2 = self.flights_uid[aircraft.queue[i+1].flight_uid]
 515				try:
 516					assert f1.destination_airport_uid == f2.origin_airport_uid
 517				except:
 518					print('The', aircraft, 'have the following queue:', aircraft.queue)
 519					print('Flights at positions', i, 'and', i+1, '(uids', f1, 'and',
 520							f2, '), (ids', f1.id, 'and', f2.id,
 521							') do not have the same landing/departure airport')
 522					print('The destination airport of', f1, 'is:', f1.destination_airport_uid)
 523					print('The origin airport of', f2, 'is:', f2.origin_airport_uid)
 524					raise

 533								log_file=self.log_file_it,
 534								rs = self.rs,
 535								hotspot_solver=self.sc.paras.get('hotspot_solver', None),
 536								hotspot_time_before_resolution=self.sc.paras['network_manager__hotspot_time_before_resolution'],
 537								hotpost_archetype_function=self.sc.paras.get('network_manager__hotpost_archetype_function', None),
 538								hostpot_minimum_resolution_size=self.sc.paras['network_manager__hostpot_minimum_resolution_size'],
 539								hotspot_save_folder=self.paras['outputs_handling__hotspot_save_folder'],
 540								module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('NetworkManager', {}))
 541
 542		self.nm.register_atfm_probabilities(p_non_weather=self.sc.non_weather_prob_atfm,
 543											p_weather=self.sc.weather_prob_atfm,
 544											iedf_atfm_non_weather=self.sc.non_weather_atfm_delay_dist,
 545											iedf_atfm_weather=self.sc.weather_atfm_delay_dist)
 546
 547		self.uid += 1
 548
 549		self.radar = Radar(self.postman,
 550							env=self.env,
 551							uid=self.uid,
 552							mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__radar'],
 553							acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
 554							verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
 555							log_file=self.log_file_it,
 556							rs=self.rs,
 557							module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('Radar', {}))
 558		self.uid += 1
 559
 560		self.nm.register_radar(radar=self.radar)
 561
 562		# This is not an agent
 563		self.cr = CentralRegistry()
 564
 565		# ONLY FOR TESTING
 566		self.cr.register_network_manager(self.nm)
 567
 568	def define_regulations_airport(self, dregs_airports, regulations_day):
 569		self.regulations_day_dt = (dt.datetime.strptime(regulations_day[1:-1], '%Y-%m-%d'))  # [1:-1] to remove the ' '
 570
 571		day_reg = self.regulations_day_dt.date()
 572		prev_day_reg = (self.regulations_day_dt+dt.timedelta(days=-1)).date()
 573		next_day_reg = (self.regulations_day_dt+dt.timedelta(days=1)).date()
 574
 575		ref_day_flight = self.sc.df_schedules['sobt'].apply(lambda x: x.date()).value_counts().idxmax()
 576		prev_ref_day_flight = (ref_day_flight+dt.timedelta(days=-1))
 577		next_ref_day_flight = (ref_day_flight+dt.timedelta(days=1))
 578
 579		mmprint('Modifying DataFrame')
 580		dregs_airports = dregs_airports.copy()
 581		dregs_airports['reg_period_start'] = dregs_airports['reg_period_start'].apply(lambda x: x.replace(year=ref_day_flight.year, month=ref_day_flight.month, day=ref_day_flight.day)
 582																										if x.date() == day_reg else
 583																								(x.replace(year=prev_ref_day_flight.year, month=prev_ref_day_flight.month, day=prev_ref_day_flight.day)
 584																										if x.date() == prev_day_reg else
 585																								(x.replace(year=next_ref_day_flight.year, month=next_ref_day_flight.month, day=next_ref_day_flight.day)
 586																										if x.date() == next_day_reg else None)))
 587
 588		dregs_airports['reg_period_end'] = dregs_airports['reg_period_end'].apply(lambda x: x.replace(year=ref_day_flight.year, month=ref_day_flight.month, day=ref_day_flight.day)
 589																										if x.date() == day_reg else
 590																								(x.replace(year=prev_ref_day_flight.year, month=prev_ref_day_flight.month, day=prev_ref_day_flight.day)
 591																										if x.date() == prev_day_reg else
 592																								(x.replace(year=next_ref_day_flight.year, month=next_ref_day_flight.month, day=next_ref_day_flight.day)
 593																										if x.date() == next_day_reg else None)))
 594
 595		mmprint('Creating capacity periods and atfm regulation')
 596		dict_regulations = {}
 597		for i, row in dregs_airports.iterrows():
 598			cp = CapacityPeriod(capacity=row['capacity'],
 599								start_time=(row['reg_period_start']-self.sc.reference_dt).total_seconds()/60.,
 600								end_time=(row['reg_period_end']-self.sc.reference_dt).total_seconds()/60.)
 601
 602			if cp.start_time > cp.end_time:
 603				mmprint("******* Regulation period ending before starting, manually adjusting",
 604						row['reg_sid'], row['capacity'], row['reg_period_start'], row['reg_period_end'])
 605				cp.end_time = cp.start_time+1
 606
 607			regulation = dict_regulations.get(row['reg_sid'], None)
 608			if regulation is None:
 609				if row['icao_id'] in self.airports_per_icao.keys():
 610					regulation = ATFMRegulation(location=self.airports_per_icao[row['icao_id']].uid,
 611												capacity_periods=[cp],
 612												env=self.env)
 613					dict_regulations[row['reg_sid']] = regulation
 614			else:
 615				dict_regulations[row['reg_sid']].add_capacity_period(cp)
 616
 617		for reg in dict_regulations.values():
 618			self.nm.register_atfm_regulation(reg)
 619
 620	def create_atfm_at_airports(self):
 621		if self.sc.manual_airport_regulations is not None:
 622			self.define_regulations_airport(self.sc.df_dregs_airports_manual,
 623											self.sc.regulations_day_manual)
 624
 625		if self.sc.regulations_day_all is not None:
 626			self.define_regulations_airport(self.sc.df_dregs_airports_all,
 627											self.sc.regulations_day_all)
 628
 629	def create_airports(self):
 630		df = self.sc.df_airport_data
 631		df_m_dcap = self.sc.df_airports_modif_data_due_cap
 632		df_m_dcap = df_m_dcap.set_index('icao_id')['modif_cap_due_traffic_diff'].to_dict()
 633
 634		pouet = self.sc.df_mtt.groupby(['airport_size', 'wake']).mean()
 635		dic_mtt = {size: {wake: {typ: pouet.loc[size].loc[wake][typ]
 636				for typ in pouet.columns
 637						} for wake in set(pouet.index.get_level_values(1))
 638					} for size in set(pouet.index.get_level_values(0))
 639			}
 640
 641		self.airports_per_icao = {}  # keys are ICAO
 642
 643		for i, row in list(df.iterrows()):
 644			min_tt = self.sc.paras['airports__minimum_taxi_time']
 645
 646			# Capacity = declared arriva/dep capacity * modifier due to traffic different in sim than reality \
 647			#            * capacity_modifier depending on delay in simulation * reduction due to use arrival/demand capacity segregated
 648			airport_arrival_capacity = int(row['declared_capacity'] * df_m_dcap.get(row['icao_id'], 1.)
 649									* self.sc.dict_scn['capacity_modifier'] * self.sc.paras['airports__cap_ratio_mix_use_arrival_reduction'])
 650
 651			airport_departure_capacity = int(row['declared_capacity'] * df_m_dcap.get(row['icao_id'], 1.)
 652									* self.sc.dict_scn['capacity_modifier'] * self.sc.paras['airports__cap_ratio_mix_use_departure_reduction'])
 653
 654			airport = GroundAirport(self.postman,
 655							idd=i,
 656							uid=self.uid,
 657							icao=row['icao_id'],
 658							coords=(row['lat'], row['lon']),
 659							arrival_capacity=airport_arrival_capacity,
 660							departure_capacity=airport_departure_capacity,
 661							curfew=self.sc.dict_cf.get(row['icao_id'], None),
 662							exot=10.,
 663							env=self.env,
 664							min_tt=min_tt,
 665							mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__airport'],
 666							acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
 667							verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
 668							log_file=self.log_file_it,  # TODO: remove
 669							rs=self.rs,
 670							module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('GroundAirport', {}))
 671
 672			# Taxi out estimation
 673			mu, sig = row['mean_taxi_out'], row['std_taxi_out']
 674			mu, sig = mu*self.sc.dict_scn['taxi_time_modifier'], sig*self.sc.dict_scn['taxi_time_modifier']
 675			if sig == 0.:
 676				sig = 1.
 677
 678			scale, s = scale_and_s_from_mean_sigma_lognorm(mu-min_tt, sig)
 679			if scale < 0. or s < 0.:
 680				print('PROBLEM:', row['icao_id'], scale, s)
 681			dists = lognorm(loc=min_tt, scale=scale, s=s)
 682			airport.give_taxi_out_time_estimation_dist(dists)
 683
 684			# Taxi in estimation
 685			mu, sig = row['mean_taxi_in'], row['std_taxi_in']
 686			mu, sig = mu*self.sc.dict_scn['taxi_time_modifier'], sig*self.sc.dict_scn['taxi_time_modifier']
 687			if sig == 0.:
 688				sig = 1.
 689
 690			scale, s = scale_and_s_from_mean_sigma_lognorm(mu-min_tt, sig)
 691			dists = lognorm(loc=min_tt, scale=scale, s=s)
 692			airport.give_taxi_in_time_estimation_dist(dists)
 693
 694			# Changes to taxi in/out estimation
 695			dists = norm(loc=0., scale=self.sc.paras['airports__taxi_estimation_scale'])
 696			airport.give_taxi_time_add_dist(dists)
 697
 698			# Turnaround times`
 699			dists = {k: {kk: expon(loc=vv, scale=self.sc.dict_scn['lambda_tat'])
 700							for kk, vv in v.items()}
 701						for k, v in dic_mtt[row['size']].items()}
 702			airport.give_turnaround_time_dists(dists)
 703
 704			# Connecting times
 705			mct_q = self.sc.paras['airports__mct_q']
 706			mcts = {'N-N': row['MCT_domestic'],
 707					'I-I': row['MCT_international'],
 708					'N-I': row['MCT_standard']}
 709
 710			sig_ct = self.sc.paras['airports__sig_ct']
 711			dists = {'economy': {}, 'flex': {}}
 712			for k, mct in mcts.items():
 713				scale, s = scale_and_s_from_quantile_sigma_lognorm(mct_q, mct, sig_ct)
 714				dists['economy'][k] = lognorm(loc=0., scale=scale, s=s)
 715				dists['flex'][k] = lognorm(loc=0., scale=scale, s=s)
 716
 717			airport.give_connecting_time_dist(dists, mct_q=mct_q)
 718			self.airports_per_icao[row['icao_id']] = airport
 719
 720			self.cr.register_mcts(airport)
 721			self.uid += 1
 722
 723		self.airports = {airport.uid: airport for airport in self.airports_per_icao.values()}
 724
 725	def create_AMANs(self):
 726		self.eamans = {}
 727		for i, row in self.sc.df_eaman_data.iterrows():
 728			if self.airports_per_icao.get(row['icao_id'], None) is not None:
 729				eaman = EAMAN(self.postman,
 730							idd=i,
 731							env=self.env,
 732							uid=self.uid,
 733							planning_horizon=row['planning_horizon_nm'],
 734							execution_horizon=row['execution_horizon_nm'],
 735							max_holding_minutes=self.sc.paras.get('eaman__max_holding_minutes'),
 736							solver=self.sc.paras['eaman__solver'],
 737							slot_planning_oversubscription=self.sc.paras.get('eaman__eaman_slot_planning_oversubscription', 0),
 738							mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__eaman'],
 739							acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
 740							verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
 741							log_file=self.log_file_it,
 742							rs=self.rs,
 743							module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('EAMAN', {}),
 744							**self.module_agent_paras.get('EAMAN', {})
 745							  )
 746				eaman.reference_dt = self.sc.reference_dt
 747				eaman.build()
 748				# regulations_at_airport = self.nm.atfm_regulations.get(self.airports_per_icao[row['icao_id']].uid,None)
 749
 750				self.cr.register_agent(eaman)
 751				eaman.register_airport(airport=self.airports_per_icao[row['icao_id']])  # ,regulations=regulations_at_airport)
 752				eaman.register_radar(radar=self.radar)
 753				self.airports_per_icao[row['icao_id']].register_eaman(eaman=eaman)
 754				self.eamans[eaman.uid] = eaman
 755				self.uid += 1
 756
 757		idx = len(self.sc.df_eaman_data)
 758
 759		# For all the airports which do not have an EAMAN, create a stupid one.
 760		for icao, airport in self.airports_per_icao.items():
 761			if ('eaman_uid' not in airport.__dict__.keys()) or (airport.eaman_uid is None):
 762				eaman = AMAN(self.postman,
 763							idd=idx,
 764							env=self.env,
 765							uid=self.uid,
 766							execution_horizon=self.sc.paras['eaman__default_horizon'],
 767							mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__eaman'],
 768							acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
 769							verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
 770							log_file=self.log_file_it,
 771							module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('AMAN', {}))
 772				eaman.build()
 773				regulations_at_airport = self.nm.atfm_regulations.get(self.airports_per_icao[icao].uid, None)
 774
 775				self.cr.register_agent(eaman)
 776				eaman.register_airport(airport=airport)  # ,regulations=regulations_at_airport)
 777				eaman.register_radar(radar=self.radar)
 778				airport.register_eaman(eaman=eaman)
 779				self.eamans[eaman.uid] = eaman
 780				self.uid += 1
 781				idx += 1
 782
