 803	def create_AOCs_and_alliances(self):
 804
 805		self.aocs, self.aocs_uid, self.alliances = {}, {}, {}
 806		for i, row in self.sc.df_airlines_data.iterrows():
 807			# print('Creating AOC:', row['ICAO'])
 808			# Apply module modification pertaining only to this agent
 809			this_agent = 'AirlineOperatingCentre'
 810			module_agent_modif = deepcopy(self.module_agent_modif.get(this_agent, {}))
 811			mspecss = self.module_agent_modif_post.get(this_agent, {})
 812
 813			for mspecs in mspecss:
 814				if row['ICAO'] in mspecs['apply_to'][this_agent]:
 815					for agent, role_modif in mspecs.get('agent_modif', {}).items():
 816						if agent == this_agent:
 817							for role, modif in role_modif.items():
 818								if role != 'on_init':
 819									if role not in module_agent_modif.keys():
 820										module_agent_modif[role] = {}
 821
 822									for met1, met2 in modif.items():
 823										if met1 != 'on_init':
 824											module_agent_modif[role][met1] = met2
 825										else:
 826											module_agent_modif[role][met1] = module_agent_modif[role].get(met1, []) + [met2]
 827								else:  # this is for on_init at the agent level
 828									module_agent_modif['on_init'] = self.module_agent_modif[agent].get('on_init', []) + [modif]
 829			
 830			aoc = AirlineOperatingCentre(self.postman,
 831										icao=row['ICAO'],
 832										env=self.env,
 833										idd=i,
 834										uid=self.uid,
 835										series_id=self.paras['series_id'],
 836										p_cancellation=self.sc.paras['airlines__p_cancellation'],
 837										airline_type=row['AO_type'],
 838										compensation_uptake=self.sc.paras['airlines__compensation_uptake'],
 839										delay_estimation_lag=self.sc.paras['airlines__delay_estimation_lag'],
 840										compute_fp_using_pool=self.sc.paras['flight_plans__compute_fp_using_pool'],
 841										mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__aoc'],
 842										acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
 843										verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
 844										log_file=self.log_file_it,
 845										rs=self.rs,
 846										fuel_price=self.sc.paras['airlines__fuel_price'],
 847										smoothness_fp=self.sc.paras['airlines__smoothness_fp'],
 848										fp_anchor=self.sc.paras['airlines__fp_anchor'],
 849										threshold_swap=self.sc.paras['airlines__threshold_swap'],
 850										heuristic_knock_on_factor=self.sc.paras['airlines__heuristic_knock_on_factor'],
 851										dict_curfew_nonpax_cost=self.sc.dict_curfew_nonpax_costs,
 852										dict_curfew_estimated_pax_avg_costs=self.sc.dict_curfew_estimated_pax_avg_costs,
 853										cancel_cascade_curfew=self.sc.paras['airlines__cancel_cascade_curfew'],
 854										slow_down_th=self.sc.paras['airlines__slow_down_th'],
 855										max_extra_fuel_used=self.sc.paras['airlines__max_extra_fuel_used'],
 856										remove_shorter_route_calibration=self.sc.paras['airlines__remove_shorter_route_calibration'],
 857										dci_min_delay=self.sc.paras['airlines__dci_min_delay'],
 858										dci_max_delay=self.sc.paras['airlines__dci_max_delay'],
 859										dci_p_bias=self.sc.paras['airlines__dci_p_bias'],
 860										wait_for_passenger_thr=self.sc.paras['airlines__wait_for_passenger_thr'],
 861										module_agent_modif=module_agent_modif,
 862										reference_dt=self.sc.reference_dt,
 863										min_time_for_FP_recomputation=self.sc.paras['airlines__min_time_for_FP_recomputation'])
 864			self.uid += 1 
 865			dist = expon(loc=self.sc.paras['airlines__non_ATFM_delay_loc'],
 866						scale=self.sc.dict_scn['non_ATFM_delay_lambda'])
 867
 868			aoc.give_delay_distr(dist)
 869
 870			self.aocs[row['ICAO']] = aoc
 871			self.aocs_uid[aoc.uid] = aoc
 872
 873			aoc.register_nm(self.nm)
 874			self.nm.register_airline(aoc)
 875
 876			# Duty of care
 877			df = self.sc.df_doc.copy()
 878			if row['AO_type'] == 'FSC':
 879				df['economy'] = df['base']
 880				df['flex'] = (df['high'] + df['base'])/2.
 881			else:
 882				df['economy'] = (df['base'] + df['low'])/2.
 883				df['flex'] = (df['base'] + df['base'])/2.
 884
 885			doc_func = build_step_multi_valued_function(df,
 886														add_lower_bound=0.,
 887														columns=['economy', 'flex'])
 888
 889			aoc.give_duty_of_care_func(doc_func)
 890
 891			# Compensation
 892			compensation_func = build_step_bivariate_function(self.sc.df_compensation,
 893															add_lower_bound2=0.)
 894
 895			aoc.give_compensation_func(compensation_func)
 896
 897			# Cost of delay (maintenance/crew)
 898			aoc.give_non_pax_cost_delay(self.sc.dict_np_cost[row['AO_type']],
 899										self.sc.dict_np_cost_fit[row['AO_type']])
 900
 901			# TODO: only register relevant airports!
 902			for airport in self.airports_per_icao.values():
 903				aoc.register_airport(airport)
 904
 905			# TODO: only register relevant fp for this given AOC
 906			aoc.register_fp_pool(self.fp_pool)
 907
 908			if not row['alliance'] in self.alliances.keys():
 909				alliance = Alliance(uid=self.uid, icao=row['alliance'])
 910				self.cr.register_alliance(alliance)
 911				self.alliances[row['alliance']] = alliance
 912				self.uid += 1
 913
 914			self.alliances[row['alliance']].register_airline(aoc)
 915
 916	def create_flights(self):
 917		self.flights = {} # keys are IFPS here !!!
 918		self.flights_uid = {} # keys are uids.
 919		self.aircraft = {}
 920
 921		for i, row in self.sc.df_schedules.iterrows():
 922			if (row['registration'] is None) or (row['registration'] == '') or pd.isnull(row['registration']):
 923				row['registration'] = self.uid
 924			if not row['registration'] in self.aircraft.keys():
 925				aircraft = Aircraft(self.env,
 926										idd=i,
 927										uid=self.uid,
 928										registration = row['registration'],
 929										seats=row['max_seats'],
 930										ac_type=row['aircraft_type'],
 931										bada_code_ac_model=self.sc.dict_ac_bada_code_ac_model[row['aircraft_type']],
 932										bada_code_ac_model_ac_eq=self.sc.dict_ac_bada_code_ac_model_with_ac_eq[row['aircraft_type']],
 933										rs=self.rs)
 934				if aircraft.bada_code_ac_model is None:
 935					aprint("Aircraft performances missing for ", row['aircraft_type'])
 936					raise Exception()
 937
 938
 939				aircraft.bada_performances = self.sc.dict_ac_model_perf.get(aircraft.bada_code_ac_model,
 940																				self.sc.dict_ac_model_perf.get(aircraft.bada_code_ac_model,
 941																													 self.sc.dict_ac_model_perf.get(aircraft.bada_code_ac_model_ac_eq)))
 942
 943				if aircraft.bada_performances is None:
 944					aprint("Aircraft BADA performances missing for ", aircraft.bada_code_ac_model)
 945					raise Exception()
 946
 947				aircraft.wtc = aircraft.bada_performances.wtc
 948
 949				self.aircraft[row['registration']] = aircraft
 950				self.uid += 1
 951			else:
 952				aircraft = self.aircraft[row['registration']]
 953
 954			airport_curfew = self.airports_per_icao[row['destination']].curfew
 955			curfew_flight = None
 956			if airport_curfew is not None:
 957				curfew_flight = dt.datetime.combine(row['sibt'].date(), airport_curfew)
 958				# THESE TWO LINES NEED TO BE PUT BACK TO WORK AFTER TESTING WITH CURFEW DONE
 959				if row['sibt'].time() > airport_curfew:
 960					curfew_flight += dt.timedelta(days=1)
 961
 962				curfew_flight = (curfew_flight-self.sc.reference_dt).total_seconds()/60.
 963			else:
 964				curfew_flight = 9999999999999999
 965
 966			thisone = False
 967			flight = Flight(self.postman,
 968							sobt=(row['sobt']-self.sc.reference_dt).total_seconds()/60.,
 969							sibt=(row['sibt']-self.sc.reference_dt).total_seconds()/60.,
 970							env=self.env,
 971							idd=int(row['nid']),
 972							uid=self.uid,
 973							origin_airport_uid=self.airports_per_icao[row['origin']].uid,
 974							destination_airport_uid=self.airports_per_icao[row['destination']].uid,
 975							nm_uid=self.nm.uid,
 976							ac_uid=aircraft.uid,
 977							aircraft=aircraft,
 978							prob_climb_extra=self.sc.prob_climb_extra.copy(),
 979							extra_climb_tweak=self.sc.dict_scn['extra_climb_tweak'],
 980							prob_cruise_extra=self.sc.prob_cruise_extra.copy(),
 981							dist_extra_cruise_if_dci=self.sc.dist_extra_cruise_if_dci.copy(),
 982							use_trajectory_uncertainty = self.sc.paras['flights__use_trajectory_uncertainty'],
 983							# use_wind_uncertainty = self.sc.paras['flights__use_wind_uncertainty'],
 984							wind_uncertainty = self.sc.paras['flights__wind_uncertainty'],
 985							wind_uncertainty_consistency = self.sc.paras['flights__wind_uncertainty_consistency'],
 986							mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__flight'],
 987							acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
 988							verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
 989							log_file=self.log_file_it,
 990							default_holding_altitude=self.sc.paras['flights__default_holding_altitude'],
 991							default_holding_ff=self.sc.paras['flights__default_holding_ff'],
 992							curfew=curfew_flight,
 993							can_propagate_to_curfew=(int(row['nid']) in self.sc.l_ids_propagate_to_curfew),
 994							exclude=row.get('exclude', None),
 995							rs=self.rs,
 996							thisone=thisone,
 997							module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('Flight', {}),
 998							callsign=row.get('callsign', None))
 999			self.uid += 1
1000			self.flights[int(row['nid'])] = flight
1001			self.flights_uid[flight.uid] = flight
1002
1003			aoc = self.aocs[row['airline']]
1004
1005			aoc.register_aircraft(aircraft)
1006			aoc.register_flight(flight)
1007
1008		# print('Number of flights', len(self.flights))
1009		for aoc in self.aocs.values():
1010			self.cr.register_airline(aoc)
1011
1012	def create_pax(self):
1013		self.paxs = []
1014		for i, row in self.sc.df_pax_data.iterrows():
1015			it = [self.flights[int(row['leg1'])]]
1016			if not pd.isnull(row['leg2']):
1017				it += [self.flights[int(row['leg2'])]]
1018			if not pd.isnull(row['leg3']):
1019				it += [self.flights[int(row['leg3'])]]
1020
1021			airlines = set([self.aocs[f.aoc_info['ao_icao']] for f in it])
1022
1023			ticket_type = str(row['ticket_type'])
1024			pax = PaxItineraryGroup(n_pax=int(row['pax']),
1025									pax_type=ticket_type,
1026									idd=i,
1027									origin_uid=it[0].origin_airport_uid,
1028									destination_uid=it[-1].destination_airport_uid,
1029									fare=row['avg_fare'],
1030									dic_soft_cost=self.sc.dic_soft_cost,
1031									rs=self.rs)
1032
1033			pax.give_itinerary([f.uid for f in it])
1034			for airline in airlines:
1035				airline.register_pax_itinerary_group(pax)
1036			self.paxs.append(pax)

1038	def dump_all_results(self, n_iter, connection, profile, save_path):
1039		with clock_time(message_before='Dumping everything...',
1040						oneline=False,
1041						print_function=mmprint):
1042
1043			paras_written = False
1044
1045			for output in self.paras['outputs_handling__outputs']:
1046				stuff = output.split('output_')[-1]
1047
1048				data = None
1049				try:
1050					data = getattr(self, 'df_'+stuff)
1051				except:
1052					pass
1053
1054				if data is not None:
1055					for p in self.paras['outputs_handling__paras_to_keep_in_output']:
1056						if p != 'scenario':
1057							data[p] = [self.sc.paras[p]] * len(data)
1058
1059					if connection['type'] == 'mysql':
1060
1061						# TODO: include paras to keep in output to index!!!
1062						primary_dict = self.create_primary_keys(stuff)
1063
1064						write_data(fmt='mysql',
1065									data=data,
1066									table_name=output,
1067									primary_dict=primary_dict,
1068									how=profile['mode'],
1069									use_temp_csv=profile['use_temp_csv'],
1070									connection=connection,
1071									keys_for_update={'scenario_id': self.sc.paras['scenario'],
1072													'n_iter': self.n_iter,
1073													'model_version': model_version},
1074									hard_update=True,
1075									index={'index_scenario': ['scenario_id'],
1076											'index_scenario_iter': ['scenario_id', 'n_iter']})
1077
1078					if connection['type'] == 'file':
1079						file_name = output + str('.csv.gz')
1080
1081						write_data(fmt=profile['fmt'],
1082									data=data,
1083									path=save_path,
1084									file_name=file_name,
1085									connection=connection,
1086									how=profile['mode'])
1087
1088						if not paras_written:
1089							write_data(fmt='pickle',
1090									data=self.sc.paras,
1091									path=save_path,
1092									file_name='paras.pic',
1093									connection=connection,
1094									how=profile['mode'])
1095							
1096							paras_written = True
1097
1098						if self.paras['outputs_handling__save_all_hotspot_data'] is None:
1099							for reg_uid, v in self.hotspot_data.items():
1100								for stuff, vv in v.items():
1101									with open(connection['base_path'] / '{}_{}.pic'.format(reg_uid, stuff), 'wb') as f:
1102										pickle.dump(vv, f)
1103
1104		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
1105
1106	def create_primary_keys(self, name=None):
1107		primary_dict = OrderedDict()
1108		if name == 'flight':
1109			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1110			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1111			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1112			primary_dict['uid'] = 'INT'
1113		elif name == 'general_simulation':
1114			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1115			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1116			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1117		elif name == 'pax':
1118			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1119			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1120			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1121			primary_dict['id'] = 'INT'
1122		elif name == 'swap':
1123			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1124			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1125			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1126			primary_dict['flight1_uid'] = 'INT'
1127			primary_dict['id_swap'] = 'INT'
1128		elif name == 'eaman':
1129			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1130			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1131			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1132			primary_dict['uid'] = 'INT'
1133		elif name == 'dci':
1134			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1135			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1136			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1137			primary_dict['flight_uid'] = 'INT'
1138			primary_dict['dci_check_timestamp'] = 'VARCHAR(50)'
1139		elif name == 'wfp':
1140			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1141			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1142			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1143			primary_dict['flight_uid'] = 'INT'
1144		elif name == 'message':
1145			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1146			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1147			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1148		elif name == 'event':
1149			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1150			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1151			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1152		elif name == 'RNG':
1153			primary_dict['scenario_id'] = 'INT'
1154			primary_dict['n_iter'] = 'INT'
1155			primary_dict['model_version'] = 'VARCHAR(10)'
1156
1157		return primary_dict

1163	def freeze_RNG(self):

1167	def get_all_metrics(self):
1168		if not self.skipping_computation:
1169			with clock_time(message_before='Getting RNG state...',
1170							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1171				self.get_RNG()
1172
1173			# Call get_eaman before get_flight as get_flight needs to merge
1174			# with eaman result dataframe.
1175			with clock_time(message_before='Getting eaman metrics...',
1176							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1177				self.get_eaman_metrics()  
1178
1179			with clock_time(message_before='Getting flight metrics...',
1180							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1181				self.get_flight_metrics()
1182
1183			with clock_time(message_before='Getting pax metrics...',
1184							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1185				self.get_pax_group_metrics()
1186
1187			with clock_time(message_before='Getting hotspot metrics...',
1188							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1189				self.get_hotspot_metrics()
1190
1191			with clock_time(message_before='Getting detailed hotspot data...',
1192							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1193				self.get_detailed_hotspot_data()
1194
1195			with clock_time(message_before='Getting general simulation metrics...',
1196							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1197				self.get_general_simulation_results()
1198			
1199			with clock_time(message_before='Getting dci metrics...',
1200							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1201				self.get_dci_metrics()
1202			
1203			with clock_time(message_before='Getting wfp metrics...',
1204							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1205				self.get_wfp_metrics()
1206
1207			with clock_time(message_before='Getting message metrics...',
1208							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1209				if self.paras['debug__count_messages']:
1210					self.get_message_metrics()
1211				else:
1212					self.df_messages = None
1213
1214			with clock_time(message_before='Getting event metrics...',
1215							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1216				if self.paras['debug__count_events']:
1217					self.get_event_metrics()
1218				else:
1219					self.df_events = None
1220
1221			with clock_time(message_before='Getting module metrics...',
1222							oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1223				self.get_module_metrics()
1224			
1225			mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes

1373						]:

1380				elif k in ['sobt', 'sibt']:
1381					time = getattr(f, k)
1382					if time is not None:
1383						time = self.sc.reference_dt + dt.timedelta(minutes=time)
1384					pouet[k].append(time)
1385				elif k in ['ao_icao', 'aoc_uid', 'ao_type']:
1386					pouet[k].append(getattr(f, 'aoc_info')[k])
1387				elif k == 'origin':

1389					pouet[k].append(icao)
1390				elif k == 'destination':
1391					icao = self.airports[f.destination_airport_uid].icao
1392					pouet[k].append(icao)
1393				elif k in ['DOC', 'soft_cost', 'transfer_cost', 'compensation_cost', 'non_pax_cost', 'non_pax_curfew_cost']:
1394					aoc_uid = f.aoc_info['aoc_uid']
1395					pouet[k].append(round(self.aocs_uid[aoc_uid].aoc_flights_info[f.uid][k], 2))
1396				elif k in ['main_reason_delay', 'pax_to_board_initial', 'pax_on_board']:
1397					aoc_uid = f.aoc_info['aoc_uid']
1398					pouet[k].append(self.aocs_uid[aoc_uid].aoc_flights_info[f.uid][k])
1399				else:
1400					pouet[k].append(getattr(f, k))
1401
1402		self.df_flights = pd.DataFrame(pouet)
1403		self.df_flights['scenario_id'] = [self.sc.scenario] * len(self.df_flights)
1404		self.df_flights['case_study_id'] = [int(self.sc.case_study_conf['info']['case_study_id'])] * len(self.df_flights)
1405		self.df_flights['n_iter'] = [self.n_iter]*len(self.df_flights)
1406		self.df_flights['model_version'] = [model_version]*len(self.df_flights)
1407		self.df_flights.rename(columns=to_get, inplace=True)
1408
1409		df_eaman_with_planning = self.df_eaman[~self.df_eaman['eaman_planned_assigned_delay'].isnull()].copy()  # if null no arrival to eaman
1410		
1411		self.df_flights = self.df_flights.merge(df_eaman_with_planning[['uid',
1412																		'eaman_planned_assigned_delay',
1413																		'eaman_planned_absorbed_air',
1414																		'eaman_tactical_assigned_delay']],
1415												on='uid',
1416												how='left')
1417		
1418		self.df_flights['eaman_extra_arrival_tactical_delay'] = self.df_flights['eaman_planned_absorbed_air']+self.df_flights['eaman_tactical_assigned_delay']-self.df_flights['eaman_planned_assigned_delay']
1419		self.df_flights['eaman_diff_tact_planned_delay_assigned'] = self.df_flights['eaman_tactical_assigned_delay']-self.df_flights['eaman_planned_assigned_delay']
1420
1421		arrival_parameters = ['eaman_planned_assigned_delay', 'eaman_planned_absorbed_air', 'eaman_tactical_assigned_delay', 'eaman_extra_arrival_tactical_delay', 'eaman_diff_tact_planned_delay_assigned']
1422
1423		self.df_flights = self.df_flights[['scenario_id', 'case_study_id', 'n_iter', 'model_version']+list(to_get.values())+arrival_parameters]
1424
1425	def get_dci_metrics(self):
1426		to_get = OrderedDict()
1427		to_get['uid'] = 'flight_uid'
1428
1429		to_get['origin'] = 'origin'
1430		to_get['destination'] = 'destination'
1431
1432		to_get['dci_check_timestamp'] = 'dci_check_timestamp'
1433		to_get['estimated_delay'] = 'estimated_delay'
1434		to_get['recovering_delay'] = 'recovering_delay'
1435		to_get['perc_selected'] = 'perc_selected'
1436		to_get['dfuel'] = 'dfuel'
1437		to_get['extra_fuel_available'] = 'extra_fuel_available'
1438		to_get['recoverable_delay'] = 'recoverable_delay'
1439
1440		pouet = {}
1441		for k, v in to_get.items():
1442			pouet[k] = []
1443			for f in self.flights.values():
1444				decisions = getattr(f.fpip, 'get_dci_decisions')()
1445				if decisions is not None:
1446					num_dci_check_points = len(decisions)  # how many times dci check was performed
1447				else:
1448					num_dci_check_points = None
1449				if (k == 'origin') and (num_dci_check_points is not None):
1450					icao = self.airports[f.origin_airport_uid].icao
1451					pouet[k] += [icao] * num_dci_check_points
1452				elif (k == 'destination') and (num_dci_check_points is not None):
1453					icao = self.airports[f.destination_airport_uid].icao
1454					pouet[k] += [icao] * num_dci_check_points
1455				elif k in ['dci_check_timestamp', 'estimated_delay',
1456						   'recovering_delay', 'perc_selected', 'dfuel',
1457						   'extra_fuel_available', 'recoverable_delay']:
1458					dci_info_list = getattr(f.fpip, 'get_dci_decisions')()  # list of dictionaries
1459
1460					if num_dci_check_points is not None:
1461						for dci_check_point in dci_info_list:
1462							pouet[k].append(dci_check_point[k])
1463							# for every
1464				else:
1465					if num_dci_check_points is not None:
1466						pouet[k] += [getattr(f, k)] * num_dci_check_points
1467
1468		self.df_dci = pd.DataFrame(pouet)
1469		self.df_dci['scenario_id'] = [self.sc.scenario]*len(self.df_dci)
1470		self.df_dci['n_iter'] = [self.n_iter]*len(self.df_dci)
1471		self.df_dci['model_version'] = [model_version]*len(self.df_dci)
1472		self.df_dci.rename(columns=to_get, inplace=True)
1473
1474		self.df_dci = self.df_dci[['scenario_id', 'n_iter', 'model_version']+list(to_get.values())]
1475
1476	def get_wfp_metrics(self):
1477		to_get = OrderedDict()
1478		to_get['uid'] = 'flight_uid'
1479
1480		to_get['origin'] = 'origin'
1481		to_get['destination'] = 'destination'
1482
1483		to_get['num_missing_pax_groups'] = 'num_missing_pax_groups'
1484		to_get['wait_time_min'] = 'wait_time_min'
1485		to_get['wait_time_max'] = 'wait_time_max'
1486		to_get['wait_time_chosen'] = 'wait_time_chosen'

1490			pouet[k] = []

1494					if k == 'origin':

1501							   'wait_time_max', 'wait_time_chosen']:

1503							pouet[k].append(wfp_info[0][k]) # [0] due to the fact it's always the first dictionary
1504						else: # no wfp was ever even considered? --> wfp_info is an empty list
1505							pouet[k].append(None)
1506					else:
1507						pouet[k] += [getattr(f, k)]
1508

1514		self.df_wfp.rename(columns=to_get, inplace=True)
1515
1516		self.df_wfp = self.df_wfp[['scenario_id', 'n_iter', 'model_version']+list(to_get.values())]

1559		to_get = OrderedDict()

1561		to_get['original_id'] = 'original_id'
1562		to_get['n_pax'] = 'n_pax'

1571		to_get['initial_sobt'] = 'initial_sobt'
1572		to_get['final_sibt'] = 'final_sibt'
1573		to_get['initial_aobt'] = 'initial_aobt'
1574		to_get['final_aibt'] = 'final_aibt'
1575		to_get['itinerary'] = 'itinerary'
1576		to_get['original_itinerary'] = 'original_itinerary'
1577		to_get['modified_itinerary'] = 'modified_itinerary'
1578		to_get['tot_arrival_delay'] = 'tot_arrival_delay'
1579		to_get['connecting_pax'] = 'connecting_pax'
1580		to_get['final_destination_reached'] = 'final_destination_reached'
1581
1582		# all_paxs = self.paxs + [new_pax for pax in self.paxs for new_pax in pax.clones]
1583		all_paxs = self.paxs + [new_pax for aoc in self.aocs.values() for new_pax in aoc.new_paxs]
1584		max_id = max([pax.id for pax in self.paxs])
1585
1586		pouet = {k: np.full(len(all_paxs), None) for k in to_get.keys()}
1587		pouet['origin'] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1588		pouet['destination'] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1589		added_rows = []
1590		for k, v in to_get.items():
1591			for j, pax in enumerate(all_paxs):
1592				if k == 'itinerary':
1593					# Get legs
1594					for i, uid in enumerate(pax.itinerary):
1595						met = 'leg' + str(i+1)
1596						if met not in pouet.keys():
1597							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1598							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1599						pouet[met][j] = self.flights_uid[uid].id
1600
1601					# Get connecting times
1602					for i, uid in enumerate(pax.itinerary[:-1]):
1603						met = 'leg' + str(i+1) + '_ct'
1604						if met not in pouet.keys():
1605							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1606							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1607						if (not pax.aobts[i+1] is None) and (not pax.aibts[i] is None):
1608							pouet[met][j] = pax.aobts[i+1] - pax.aibts[i]
1609						else:
1610							pouet[met][j] = None
1611
1612					# Get airports
1613					airports = [self.flights_uid[flight].origin_airport_uid for flight in pax.itinerary]
1614					if len(pax.itinerary) > 0:
1615						airports.append(self.flights_uid[pax.itinerary[-1]].destination_airport_uid)
1616					airports = [self.airports[airport].icao for airport in airports]
1617					for i, airport in enumerate(airports):
1618						met = 'airport' + str(i+1)
1619						if met not in pouet.keys():
1620							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1621							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1622						pouet[met][j] = airport
1623
1624					# Get airlines
1625					airlines = [self.flights_uid[flight].aoc_info['ao_icao'] for flight in pax.itinerary]
1626					for i, airline in enumerate(airlines):
1627						met = 'airline' + str(i+1)
1628						if met not in pouet.keys():
1629							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1630							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1631						pouet[met][j] = airline
1632
1633				elif k == 'original_itinerary':
1634					# Get legs
1635					for i, uid in enumerate(pax.get_original_itinerary()):
1636						met = 'leg' + str(i+1) + '_sch'
1637						if met not in pouet.keys():
1638							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1639							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1640						pouet[met][j] = self.flights_uid[uid].id
1641
1642					# Get connecting times
1643					for i, uid in enumerate(pax.get_original_itinerary()[:-1]):
1644						met = 'leg' + str(i+1) + '_sch_ct'
1645						if met not in pouet.keys():
1646							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1647							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1648						pouet[met][j] = pax.sobts[i+1] - pax.sibts[i]
1649
1650					# Get airports
1651					airports = [self.flights_uid[flight].origin_airport_uid for flight in pax.get_original_itinerary()]
1652					airports.append(self.flights_uid[pax.get_original_itinerary()[-1]].destination_airport_uid)
1653					airports = [self.airports[airport].icao for airport in airports]
1654					for i, airport in enumerate(airports):
1655						met = 'airport' + str(i+1) + '_sch'
1656						if met not in pouet.keys():
1657							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1658							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1659						pouet[met][j] = airport
1660
1661					# Get airlines
1662					airlines = [self.flights_uid[flight].aoc_info['ao_icao'] for flight in pax.get_original_itinerary()]
1663					for i, airline in enumerate(airlines):
1664						met = 'airline' + str(i+1)
1665						if met not in pouet.keys():
1666							added_rows = added_rows + [met]
1667							pouet[met] = np.full(len(all_paxs), None)
1668						pouet[met][j] = airline
1669
1670				elif k in ['initial_sobt', 'final_sibt', 'initial_aobt', 'final_aibt', 'time_at_gate']:
1671					try:
1672						time = getattr(pax, k)
1673					except:
1674						print(pax)
1675						raise
1676					if time is not None:
1677						time = self.sc.reference_dt + dt.timedelta(minutes=time)
1678					pouet[k][j] = time
1679				elif k == 'origin_uid':
1680					pouet[k][j] = getattr(pax, k)
1681					icao = self.airports[pax.origin_uid].icao
1682					pouet['origin'][j] = icao
1683				elif k == 'destination_uid':
1684					pouet[k][j] = getattr(pax, k)
1685					icao = self.airports[pax.destination_uid].icao
1686					pouet['destination'][j] = icao
1687				else:
1688					pouet[k][j] = getattr(pax, k)
1689
1690		self.df_pax = pd.DataFrame(pouet)
1691		self.df_pax['scenario_id'] = [self.sc.scenario]*len(self.df_pax)
1692		self.df_pax['case_study_id'] = [int(self.sc.case_study_conf['info']['case_study_id'])] * len(self.df_pax)
1693		self.df_pax['n_iter'] = [self.n_iter]*len(self.df_pax)
1694		self.df_pax['model_version'] = [model_version]*len(self.df_pax)

1697

1699		rows_dict.remove('itinerary')
1700		rows_dict.remove('original_itinerary')
1701		self.df_pax = self.df_pax[['scenario_id', 'case_study_id', 'n_iter', 'model_version']+rows_dict+added_rows]

1703	def get_hotspot_metrics(self):
1704		dic = self.nm.hm.hotspot_metrics
1705
1706		dd = {}
1707		for reg_id, d in dic.items():
1708			cols = {}
1709			for col in d.keys():
1710				if not col in ['flights']:
1711					cols[col] = [d[col][flight_uid] for flight_uid in d['flights'] if flight_uid in d[col].keys()]
1712			cols['flights'] = d['flights']
1713
1714			dd[reg_id] = pd.DataFrame.from_dict(cols, orient='index').T.set_index('flights', inplace=False)
1715
1716		if len(dd) > 0:
1717			self.df_hotspot = pd.concat(dd)
1718
1719			self.df_hotspot['airlines'] = self.df_hotspot['airlines'].astype(int)
1720
1721			self.df_hotspot['scenario_id'] = [self.sc.scenario]*len(self.df_hotspot)
1722			self.df_hotspot['n_iter'] = [self.n_iter]*len(self.df_hotspot)
1723			self.df_hotspot['model_version'] = [model_version]*len(self.df_hotspot)
1724			self.df_hotspot.index.rename(['regulation', 'flights'], inplace=True)
1725		else:
1726			self.df_hotspot = pd.DataFrame()

1784	def prepare_everything(self):
1785		with clock_time(message_before='Preparing IP for simulation...',
1786						oneline=True, print_function=mmprint):
1787			self.cr.prepare_for_simulation(self.alliances.values())
1788
1789		for agent in self.agents:
1790			agent.prepare_for_simulation()

1833	def run_world(self, n_iter):
1834		mmprint("Starting simulation at:", dt.datetime.now())
1835		with clock_time(message_after='Simulation executed in',
1836			print_function=mmprint):
1837
1838			print('Running simulation...')
1839			self.n_iter = n_iter
1840
1841			if self.paras['outputs_handling__insert_time_stamp']:
1842				self.timestamp_iteration = '_{}'.format(dt.datetime.now())
1843				self.add_path = '{}_{}{}'.format(model_version, self.sc.scenario, self.timestamp_iteration)
1844			else:
1845				self.add_path = '{}_{}_{}'.format(model_version, self.sc.scenario, self.n_iter)
1846
1847			self.skipping_computation = False
1848			for agent in self.aocs.values():
1849				agent.n_iter = n_iter
1850
1851			self.prepare_everything()
1852
1853			self.env.run()
1854
1855			self.finalise_everything()
1856
1857			mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
1858
1859			dic = {}
1860			normed = {}
1861			for aoc in self.aocs.values():
1862				for key, value in aoc.times.items():
1863					dic[key] = dic.get(key, dt.timedelta(0.)) + value
1864					normed[key] = len(self.aocs)
1865
1866			for flight in self.flights.values():
1867				for key, value in flight.times.items():
1868					dic[key] = dic.get(key, dt.timedelta(0.)) + value
1869					normed[key] = len(self.flights)
1870
1871			mmprint('CPU time per method:')
1872			for key, value in dic.items():
1873				mmprint(key, ':', value)
1874			mmprint()
1875			mmprint('CPU time per method (normalised):')
1876			for key, value in dic.items():
1877				mmprint(key, ':', value/normed[key])
1878			mmprint()

def load_scenario( self, info_scenario=None, case_study_conf=None, data_scenario=None, paras_scenario=None, connection=None, log_file=None): 
188	def load_scenario(self, info_scenario=None, case_study_conf=None, data_scenario=None, paras_scenario=None,
189					  connection=None, log_file=None):
190		"""
191		This method does not need to be called at every iteration.
192		"""
193		sl = ScenarioLoaderSelector().select(self.paras['read_profile']['scenario_loader'])
194		
195		self.sc = sl(info_scenario=info_scenario,
196					 case_study_conf=case_study_conf,
197					 data_scenario=data_scenario,
198					paras_scenario=paras_scenario,
199					log_file=log_file,
200					print_color_info=self.paras['print_colors__info'])
201
202		self.sc.load_all_data(data_to_load=self.data_to_load,
203								process=self.process,
204								connection=connection,
205								rs=self.rs,
206								profile_paras=self.paras['read_profile'],
207								verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'])
208
209		# TODO: check incompatibilities between modules.
210		# Load modules
211		self.modules = OrderedDict()  # to keep loading order, in case important.
212
213		self.path_module = Path(self.sc.paras['modules__path'])
214		if not self.path_module.is_absolute():
215			root_path = Path(__file__).resolve().parent.parent
216			self.path_module = root_path / self.path_module
217
218		# Modifications to ALL agents
219		self.module_agent_modif = OrderedDict({})
220
221		# Modifications to some agents only; to be loaded in each agent creation method
222		self.module_agent_modif_post = OrderedDict({})
223		
224		# Module parameters to add to the agent builder
225		self.module_agent_paras = OrderedDict({})
226
227		# Note: parameters are passed from outside, in the self.sc.paras dictionary, with mthe module__parametername
228		# format
229		self.get_modules_results_functions = []
230		print('Modules to be loaded:', self.sc.paras['modules__modules_to_load'])
231		for module in self.sc.paras['modules__modules_to_load']:
232			# self.module_agent_paras[module] = copy(self.sc.paras[module])
233
234			# Load module
235			cred = load_mercury_module(path_module=self.path_module,
236									   module_name=module)
237
238			# This allows modules to compute their proper metrics. For this they need to define a function called
239			# "get_metric" that has a single argument, the world builder.
240			mspecs = cred.__getattribute__('module_specs')
241			if not mspecs.get('get_metric', None) is None:
242				self.get_modules_results_functions.append(mspecs.get('get_metric'))
243
244			# Here if we go though all the modifications specified in all the module files
245			for agent, role_modif in mspecs.get('agent_modif', {}).items():
246				self.module_agent_paras[agent] = {'{}__{}'.format(module, para_name): self.sc.paras['{}__{}'.format(module, para_name)] for para_name in role_modif.get('new_parameters', [])}
247
248				if agent not in mspecs.get('apply_to', {}).keys():
249					if agent not in self.module_agent_modif.keys():
250						self.module_agent_modif[agent] = {}
251
252					for role, modif in role_modif.items():
253						if role != 'on_init':
254							if type(modif) == dict:
255								if role not in self.module_agent_modif[agent].keys():
256									self.module_agent_modif[agent][role] = {}
257
258								for met1, met2 in modif.items():
259									if met1 != 'on_init':
260										self.module_agent_modif[agent][role][met1] = met2
261									else:
262										# Case where one needs to apply some stuff at the initialisation of the
263										# ROLE.
264										self.module_agent_modif[agent][role][met1] = self.module_agent_modif[agent][role].get(met1, []) + [met2]
265							else:
266								# role is not a Role but a method of the agent itself
267								self.module_agent_modif[agent][role] = modif
268						else:
269							# Case where one needs to apply some stuff at the initialisation of the
270							# AGENT.
271							self.module_agent_modif[agent]['on_init'] = self.module_agent_modif[agent].get('on_init', []) + [modif]
272				else:
273					# The apply_to is then applied in the construction method
274					# TODO: currently only working with AOCs.
275					# for agent, role_modif in mspecs.get('agent_modif', {}).items():
276					if agent not in self.module_agent_modif_post.keys():
277						self.module_agent_modif_post[agent] = []
278					self.module_agent_modif_post[agent].append(mspecs)
279

281		# for agent, modif in self.module_agent_modif.items():
282		# 	print(agent, modif)
283
284		# print('\nModule agent modifications post:', self.module_agent_modif_post)

def prepare_flight_plans(self): 
495	def prepare_flight_plans(self):
496		self.fp_pool = {}

def check_consistency(self): 
507	def check_consistency(self):
508		# Check that consecutive flights sharing the same aircraft land
509		# and depart at the same airport.
510
511		for aircraft in self.aircraft.values():
512			for i in range(0, len(aircraft.queue)-1):
513				f1 = self.flights_uid[aircraft.queue[i].flight_uid]
514				f2 = self.flights_uid[aircraft.queue[i+1].flight_uid]
515				try:
516					assert f1.destination_airport_uid == f2.origin_airport_uid
517				except:
518					print('The', aircraft, 'have the following queue:', aircraft.queue)
519					print('Flights at positions', i, 'and', i+1, '(uids', f1, 'and',
520							f2, '), (ids', f1.id, 'and', f2.id,
521							') do not have the same landing/departure airport')
522					print('The destination airport of', f1, 'is:', f1.destination_airport_uid)
523					print('The origin airport of', f2, 'is:', f2.origin_airport_uid)
524					raise

552							mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__radar'],
553							acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
554							verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
555							log_file=self.log_file_it,
556							rs=self.rs,
557							module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('Radar', {}))
558		self.uid += 1
559
560		self.nm.register_radar(radar=self.radar)
561
562		# This is not an agent
563		self.cr = CentralRegistry()
564
565		# ONLY FOR TESTING
566		self.cr.register_network_manager(self.nm)
def define_regulations_airport(self, dregs_airports, regulations_day): 
568	def define_regulations_airport(self, dregs_airports, regulations_day):
569		self.regulations_day_dt = (dt.datetime.strptime(regulations_day[1:-1], '%Y-%m-%d'))  # [1:-1] to remove the ' '
570
571		day_reg = self.regulations_day_dt.date()
572		prev_day_reg = (self.regulations_day_dt+dt.timedelta(days=-1)).date()
573		next_day_reg = (self.regulations_day_dt+dt.timedelta(days=1)).date()
574
575		ref_day_flight = self.sc.df_schedules['sobt'].apply(lambda x: x.date()).value_counts().idxmax()
576		prev_ref_day_flight = (ref_day_flight+dt.timedelta(days=-1))
577		next_ref_day_flight = (ref_day_flight+dt.timedelta(days=1))
578
579		mmprint('Modifying DataFrame')
580		dregs_airports = dregs_airports.copy()
581		dregs_airports['reg_period_start'] = dregs_airports['reg_period_start'].apply(lambda x: x.replace(year=ref_day_flight.year, month=ref_day_flight.month, day=ref_day_flight.day)
582																										if x.date() == day_reg else
583																								(x.replace(year=prev_ref_day_flight.year, month=prev_ref_day_flight.month, day=prev_ref_day_flight.day)
584																										if x.date() == prev_day_reg else
585																								(x.replace(year=next_ref_day_flight.year, month=next_ref_day_flight.month, day=next_ref_day_flight.day)
586																										if x.date() == next_day_reg else None)))
587
588		dregs_airports['reg_period_end'] = dregs_airports['reg_period_end'].apply(lambda x: x.replace(year=ref_day_flight.year, month=ref_day_flight.month, day=ref_day_flight.day)
589																										if x.date() == day_reg else
590																								(x.replace(year=prev_ref_day_flight.year, month=prev_ref_day_flight.month, day=prev_ref_day_flight.day)
591																										if x.date() == prev_day_reg else
592																								(x.replace(year=next_ref_day_flight.year, month=next_ref_day_flight.month, day=next_ref_day_flight.day)
593																										if x.date() == next_day_reg else None)))
594
595		mmprint('Creating capacity periods and atfm regulation')
596		dict_regulations = {}
597		for i, row in dregs_airports.iterrows():
598			cp = CapacityPeriod(capacity=row['capacity'],
599								start_time=(row['reg_period_start']-self.sc.reference_dt).total_seconds()/60.,
600								end_time=(row['reg_period_end']-self.sc.reference_dt).total_seconds()/60.)
601
602			if cp.start_time > cp.end_time:
603				mmprint("******* Regulation period ending before starting, manually adjusting",
604						row['reg_sid'], row['capacity'], row['reg_period_start'], row['reg_period_end'])
605				cp.end_time = cp.start_time+1
606
607			regulation = dict_regulations.get(row['reg_sid'], None)
608			if regulation is None:
609				if row['icao_id'] in self.airports_per_icao.keys():
610					regulation = ATFMRegulation(location=self.airports_per_icao[row['icao_id']].uid,
611												capacity_periods=[cp],
612												env=self.env)
613					dict_regulations[row['reg_sid']] = regulation
614			else:
615				dict_regulations[row['reg_sid']].add_capacity_period(cp)
616
617		for reg in dict_regulations.values():
618			self.nm.register_atfm_regulation(reg)
def create_atfm_at_airports(self): 
620	def create_atfm_at_airports(self):
621		if self.sc.manual_airport_regulations is not None:
622			self.define_regulations_airport(self.sc.df_dregs_airports_manual,
623											self.sc.regulations_day_manual)
624
625		if self.sc.regulations_day_all is not None:
626			self.define_regulations_airport(self.sc.df_dregs_airports_all,
627											self.sc.regulations_day_all)
def create_airports(self): 
629	def create_airports(self):
630		df = self.sc.df_airport_data
631		df_m_dcap = self.sc.df_airports_modif_data_due_cap
632		df_m_dcap = df_m_dcap.set_index('icao_id')['modif_cap_due_traffic_diff'].to_dict()
633
634		pouet = self.sc.df_mtt.groupby(['airport_size', 'wake']).mean()
635		dic_mtt = {size: {wake: {typ: pouet.loc[size].loc[wake][typ]
636				for typ in pouet.columns
637						} for wake in set(pouet.index.get_level_values(1))
638					} for size in set(pouet.index.get_level_values(0))
639			}
640
641		self.airports_per_icao = {}  # keys are ICAO
642
643		for i, row in list(df.iterrows()):
644			min_tt = self.sc.paras['airports__minimum_taxi_time']
645
646			# Capacity = declared arriva/dep capacity * modifier due to traffic different in sim than reality \
647			#            * capacity_modifier depending on delay in simulation * reduction due to use arrival/demand capacity segregated
648			airport_arrival_capacity = int(row['declared_capacity'] * df_m_dcap.get(row['icao_id'], 1.)
649									* self.sc.dict_scn['capacity_modifier'] * self.sc.paras['airports__cap_ratio_mix_use_arrival_reduction'])
650
651			airport_departure_capacity = int(row['declared_capacity'] * df_m_dcap.get(row['icao_id'], 1.)
652									* self.sc.dict_scn['capacity_modifier'] * self.sc.paras['airports__cap_ratio_mix_use_departure_reduction'])
653
654			airport = GroundAirport(self.postman,
655							idd=i,
656							uid=self.uid,
657							icao=row['icao_id'],
658							coords=(row['lat'], row['lon']),
659							arrival_capacity=airport_arrival_capacity,
660							departure_capacity=airport_departure_capacity,
661							curfew=self.sc.dict_cf.get(row['icao_id'], None),
662							exot=10.,
663							env=self.env,
664							min_tt=min_tt,
665							mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__airport'],
666							acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
667							verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
668							log_file=self.log_file_it,  # TODO: remove
669							rs=self.rs,
670							module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('GroundAirport', {}))
671
672			# Taxi out estimation
673			mu, sig = row['mean_taxi_out'], row['std_taxi_out']
674			mu, sig = mu*self.sc.dict_scn['taxi_time_modifier'], sig*self.sc.dict_scn['taxi_time_modifier']
675			if sig == 0.:
676				sig = 1.
677
678			scale, s = scale_and_s_from_mean_sigma_lognorm(mu-min_tt, sig)
679			if scale < 0. or s < 0.:
680				print('PROBLEM:', row['icao_id'], scale, s)
681			dists = lognorm(loc=min_tt, scale=scale, s=s)
682			airport.give_taxi_out_time_estimation_dist(dists)
683
684			# Taxi in estimation
685			mu, sig = row['mean_taxi_in'], row['std_taxi_in']
686			mu, sig = mu*self.sc.dict_scn['taxi_time_modifier'], sig*self.sc.dict_scn['taxi_time_modifier']
687			if sig == 0.:
688				sig = 1.
689
690			scale, s = scale_and_s_from_mean_sigma_lognorm(mu-min_tt, sig)
691			dists = lognorm(loc=min_tt, scale=scale, s=s)
692			airport.give_taxi_in_time_estimation_dist(dists)
693
694			# Changes to taxi in/out estimation
695			dists = norm(loc=0., scale=self.sc.paras['airports__taxi_estimation_scale'])
696			airport.give_taxi_time_add_dist(dists)
697
698			# Turnaround times`
699			dists = {k: {kk: expon(loc=vv, scale=self.sc.dict_scn['lambda_tat'])
700							for kk, vv in v.items()}
701						for k, v in dic_mtt[row['size']].items()}
702			airport.give_turnaround_time_dists(dists)
703
704			# Connecting times
705			mct_q = self.sc.paras['airports__mct_q']
706			mcts = {'N-N': row['MCT_domestic'],
707					'I-I': row['MCT_international'],
708					'N-I': row['MCT_standard']}
709
710			sig_ct = self.sc.paras['airports__sig_ct']
711			dists = {'economy': {}, 'flex': {}}
712			for k, mct in mcts.items():
713				scale, s = scale_and_s_from_quantile_sigma_lognorm(mct_q, mct, sig_ct)
714				dists['economy'][k] = lognorm(loc=0., scale=scale, s=s)
715				dists['flex'][k] = lognorm(loc=0., scale=scale, s=s)
716
717			airport.give_connecting_time_dist(dists, mct_q=mct_q)
718			self.airports_per_icao[row['icao_id']] = airport
719
720			self.cr.register_mcts(airport)
721			self.uid += 1
722
723		self.airports = {airport.uid: airport for airport in self.airports_per_icao.values()}

772				eaman.build()
773				regulations_at_airport = self.nm.atfm_regulations.get(self.airports_per_icao[icao].uid, None)
774
775				self.cr.register_agent(eaman)
776				eaman.register_airport(airport=airport)  # ,regulations=regulations_at_airport)
777				eaman.register_radar(radar=self.radar)

779				self.eamans[eaman.uid] = eaman

def create_AOCs_and_alliances(self): 
803	def create_AOCs_and_alliances(self):
804
805		self.aocs, self.aocs_uid, self.alliances = {}, {}, {}
806		for i, row in self.sc.df_airlines_data.iterrows():
807			# print('Creating AOC:', row['ICAO'])
808			# Apply module modification pertaining only to this agent
809			this_agent = 'AirlineOperatingCentre'
810			module_agent_modif = deepcopy(self.module_agent_modif.get(this_agent, {}))
811			mspecss = self.module_agent_modif_post.get(this_agent, {})
812
813			for mspecs in mspecss:
814				if row['ICAO'] in mspecs['apply_to'][this_agent]:
815					for agent, role_modif in mspecs.get('agent_modif', {}).items():
816						if agent == this_agent:
817							for role, modif in role_modif.items():
818								if role != 'on_init':
819									if role not in module_agent_modif.keys():
820										module_agent_modif[role] = {}
821
822									for met1, met2 in modif.items():
823										if met1 != 'on_init':
824											module_agent_modif[role][met1] = met2
825										else:
826											module_agent_modif[role][met1] = module_agent_modif[role].get(met1, []) + [met2]
827								else:  # this is for on_init at the agent level
828									module_agent_modif['on_init'] = self.module_agent_modif[agent].get('on_init', []) + [modif]
829			
830			aoc = AirlineOperatingCentre(self.postman,
831										icao=row['ICAO'],
832										env=self.env,
833										idd=i,
834										uid=self.uid,
835										series_id=self.paras['series_id'],
836										p_cancellation=self.sc.paras['airlines__p_cancellation'],
837										airline_type=row['AO_type'],
838										compensation_uptake=self.sc.paras['airlines__compensation_uptake'],
839										delay_estimation_lag=self.sc.paras['airlines__delay_estimation_lag'],
840										compute_fp_using_pool=self.sc.paras['flight_plans__compute_fp_using_pool'],
841										mcolor=self.paras['print_colors__aoc'],
842										acolor=self.paras['print_colors__alert'],
843										verbose=self.paras['computation__verbose'],
844										log_file=self.log_file_it,
845										rs=self.rs,
846										fuel_price=self.sc.paras['airlines__fuel_price'],
847										smoothness_fp=self.sc.paras['airlines__smoothness_fp'],
848										fp_anchor=self.sc.paras['airlines__fp_anchor'],
849										threshold_swap=self.sc.paras['airlines__threshold_swap'],
850										heuristic_knock_on_factor=self.sc.paras['airlines__heuristic_knock_on_factor'],
851										dict_curfew_nonpax_cost=self.sc.dict_curfew_nonpax_costs,
852										dict_curfew_estimated_pax_avg_costs=self.sc.dict_curfew_estimated_pax_avg_costs,
853										cancel_cascade_curfew=self.sc.paras['airlines__cancel_cascade_curfew'],
854										slow_down_th=self.sc.paras['airlines__slow_down_th'],
855										max_extra_fuel_used=self.sc.paras['airlines__max_extra_fuel_used'],
856										remove_shorter_route_calibration=self.sc.paras['airlines__remove_shorter_route_calibration'],
857										dci_min_delay=self.sc.paras['airlines__dci_min_delay'],
858										dci_max_delay=self.sc.paras['airlines__dci_max_delay'],
859										dci_p_bias=self.sc.paras['airlines__dci_p_bias'],
860										wait_for_passenger_thr=self.sc.paras['airlines__wait_for_passenger_thr'],
861										module_agent_modif=module_agent_modif,
862										reference_dt=self.sc.reference_dt,
863										min_time_for_FP_recomputation=self.sc.paras['airlines__min_time_for_FP_recomputation'])
864			self.uid += 1 
865			dist = expon(loc=self.sc.paras['airlines__non_ATFM_delay_loc'],
866						scale=self.sc.dict_scn['non_ATFM_delay_lambda'])
867
868			aoc.give_delay_distr(dist)
869
870			self.aocs[row['ICAO']] = aoc
871			self.aocs_uid[aoc.uid] = aoc
872
873			aoc.register_nm(self.nm)
874			self.nm.register_airline(aoc)
875
876			# Duty of care
877			df = self.sc.df_doc.copy()
878			if row['AO_type'] == 'FSC':
879				df['economy'] = df['base']
880				df['flex'] = (df['high'] + df['base'])/2.
881			else:
882				df['economy'] = (df['base'] + df['low'])/2.
883				df['flex'] = (df['base'] + df['base'])/2.
884
885			doc_func = build_step_multi_valued_function(df,
886														add_lower_bound=0.,
887														columns=['economy', 'flex'])
888
889			aoc.give_duty_of_care_func(doc_func)
890
891			# Compensation
892			compensation_func = build_step_bivariate_function(self.sc.df_compensation,
893															add_lower_bound2=0.)
894
895			aoc.give_compensation_func(compensation_func)
896
897			# Cost of delay (maintenance/crew)
898			aoc.give_non_pax_cost_delay(self.sc.dict_np_cost[row['AO_type']],
899										self.sc.dict_np_cost_fit[row['AO_type']])
900
901			# TODO: only register relevant airports!
902			for airport in self.airports_per_icao.values():
903				aoc.register_airport(airport)
904
905			# TODO: only register relevant fp for this given AOC
906			aoc.register_fp_pool(self.fp_pool)
907
908			if not row['alliance'] in self.alliances.keys():
909				alliance = Alliance(uid=self.uid, icao=row['alliance'])
910				self.cr.register_alliance(alliance)
911				self.alliances[row['alliance']] = alliance
912				self.uid += 1
913
914			self.alliances[row['alliance']].register_airline(aoc)
def create_flights(self): 
 916	def create_flights(self):
 917		self.flights = {} # keys are IFPS here !!!
 918		self.flights_uid = {} # keys are uids.
 919		self.aircraft = {}
 920
 921		for i, row in self.sc.df_schedules.iterrows():
 922			if (row['registration'] is None) or (row['registration'] == '') or pd.isnull(row['registration']):
 923				row['registration'] = self.uid
 924			if not row['registration'] in self.aircraft.keys():
 925				aircraft = Aircraft(self.env,
 926										idd=i,
 927										uid=self.uid,
 928										registration = row['registration'],
 929										seats=row['max_seats'],
 930										ac_type=row['aircraft_type'],
 931										bada_code_ac_model=self.sc.dict_ac_bada_code_ac_model[row['aircraft_type']],
 932										bada_code_ac_model_ac_eq=self.sc.dict_ac_bada_code_ac_model_with_ac_eq[row['aircraft_type']],
 933										rs=self.rs)
 934				if aircraft.bada_code_ac_model is None:
 935					aprint("Aircraft performances missing for ", row['aircraft_type'])
 936					raise Exception()
 937
 938
 939				aircraft.bada_performances = self.sc.dict_ac_model_perf.get(aircraft.bada_code_ac_model,
 940																				self.sc.dict_ac_model_perf.get(aircraft.bada_code_ac_model,
 941																													 self.sc.dict_ac_model_perf.get(aircraft.bada_code_ac_model_ac_eq)))
 942
 943				if aircraft.bada_performances is None:
 944					aprint("Aircraft BADA performances missing for ", aircraft.bada_code_ac_model)
 945					raise Exception()
 946
 947				aircraft.wtc = aircraft.bada_performances.wtc
 948
 949				self.aircraft[row['registration']] = aircraft
 950				self.uid += 1
 951			else:
 952				aircraft = self.aircraft[row['registration']]
 953
 954			airport_curfew = self.airports_per_icao[row['destination']].curfew
 955			curfew_flight = None
 956			if airport_curfew is not None:
 957				curfew_flight = dt.datetime.combine(row['sibt'].date(), airport_curfew)
 958				# THESE TWO LINES NEED TO BE PUT BACK TO WORK AFTER TESTING WITH CURFEW DONE
 959				if row['sibt'].time() > airport_curfew:
 960					curfew_flight += dt.timedelta(days=1)
 961
 962				curfew_flight = (curfew_flight-self.sc.reference_dt).total_seconds()/60.
 963			else:
 964				curfew_flight = 9999999999999999
 965
 966			thisone = False
 967			flight = Flight(self.postman,
 968							sobt=(row['sobt']-self.sc.reference_dt).total_seconds()/60.,
 969							sibt=(row['sibt']-self.sc.reference_dt).total_seconds()/60.,
 970							env=self.env,
 971							idd=int(row['nid']),
 972							uid=self.uid,
 973							origin_airport_uid=self.airports_per_icao[row['origin']].uid,
 974							destination_airport_uid=self.airports_per_icao[row['destination']].uid,
 975							nm_uid=self.nm.uid,
 976							ac_uid=aircraft.uid,
 977							aircraft=aircraft,
 978							prob_climb_extra=self.sc.prob_climb_extra.copy(),

 983							# use_wind_uncertainty = self.sc.paras['flights__use_wind_uncertainty'],
 984							wind_uncertainty = self.sc.paras['flights__wind_uncertainty'],
 985							wind_uncertainty_consistency = self.sc.paras['flights__wind_uncertainty_consistency'],

 992							curfew=curfew_flight,
 993							can_propagate_to_curfew=(int(row['nid']) in self.sc.l_ids_propagate_to_curfew),
 994							exclude=row.get('exclude', None),
 995							rs=self.rs,
 996							thisone=thisone,
 997							module_agent_modif=self.module_agent_modif.get('Flight', {}),
 998							callsign=row.get('callsign', None))
 999			self.uid += 1

1006			aoc.register_flight(flight)

1009		for aoc in self.aocs.values():
1010			self.cr.register_airline(aoc)

1038	def dump_all_results(self, n_iter, connection, profile, save_path):
1039		with clock_time(message_before='Dumping everything...',
1040						oneline=False,
1041						print_function=mmprint):

1051				except:
1052					pass
1053
1054				if data is not None:
1055					for p in self.paras['outputs_handling__paras_to_keep_in_output']:
1056						if p != 'scenario':
1057							data[p] = [self.sc.paras[p]] * len(data)
1058
1059					if connection['type'] == 'mysql':
1060
1061						# TODO: include paras to keep in output to index!!!
1062						primary_dict = self.create_primary_keys(stuff)

1066									table_name=output,

1070									connection=connection,
1071									keys_for_update={'scenario_id': self.sc.paras['scenario'],
1072													'n_iter': self.n_iter,
1073													'model_version': model_version},
1074									hard_update=True,
1075									index={'index_scenario': ['scenario_id'],
1076											'index_scenario_iter': ['scenario_id', 'n_iter']})
1077
1078					if connection['type'] == 'file':
1079						file_name = output + str('.csv.gz')
1080
1081						write_data(fmt=profile['fmt'],
1082									data=data,
1083									path=save_path,
1084									file_name=file_name,
1085									connection=connection,
1086									how=profile['mode'])
1087
1088						if not paras_written:
1089							write_data(fmt='pickle',
1090									data=self.sc.paras,
1091									path=save_path,
1092									file_name='paras.pic',
1093									connection=connection,
1094									how=profile['mode'])
1095							
1096							paras_written = True
1097
1098						if self.paras['outputs_handling__save_all_hotspot_data'] is None:
1099							for reg_uid, v in self.hotspot_data.items():
1100								for stuff, vv in v.items():
1101									with open(connection['base_path'] / '{}_{}.pic'.format(reg_uid, stuff), 'wb') as f:
1102										pickle.dump(vv, f)
1103
1104		mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes

1405		self.df_flights['n_iter'] = [self.n_iter]*len(self.df_flights)
1406		self.df_flights['model_version'] = [model_version]*len(self.df_flights)
1407		self.df_flights.rename(columns=to_get, inplace=True)
1408
1409		df_eaman_with_planning = self.df_eaman[~self.df_eaman['eaman_planned_assigned_delay'].isnull()].copy()  # if null no arrival to eaman
1410		
1411		self.df_flights = self.df_flights.merge(df_eaman_with_planning[['uid',
1412																		'eaman_planned_assigned_delay',
1413																		'eaman_planned_absorbed_air',
1414																		'eaman_tactical_assigned_delay']],
1415												on='uid',
1416												how='left')
1417

1419		self.df_flights['eaman_diff_tact_planned_delay_assigned'] = self.df_flights['eaman_tactical_assigned_delay']-self.df_flights['eaman_planned_assigned_delay']
1420
1421		arrival_parameters = ['eaman_planned_assigned_delay', 'eaman_planned_absorbed_air', 'eaman_tactical_assigned_delay', 'eaman_extra_arrival_tactical_delay', 'eaman_diff_tact_planned_delay_assigned']
1422
1423		self.df_flights = self.df_flights[['scenario_id', 'case_study_id', 'n_iter', 'model_version']+list(to_get.values())+arrival_parameters]
def get_dci_metrics(self): 
1425	def get_dci_metrics(self):
1426		to_get = OrderedDict()
1427		to_get['uid'] = 'flight_uid'
1428
1429		to_get['origin'] = 'origin'
1430		to_get['destination'] = 'destination'
1431
1432		to_get['dci_check_timestamp'] = 'dci_check_timestamp'
1433		to_get['estimated_delay'] = 'estimated_delay'
1434		to_get['recovering_delay'] = 'recovering_delay'
1435		to_get['perc_selected'] = 'perc_selected'
1436		to_get['dfuel'] = 'dfuel'
1437		to_get['extra_fuel_available'] = 'extra_fuel_available'
1438		to_get['recoverable_delay'] = 'recoverable_delay'
1439
1440		pouet = {}
1441		for k, v in to_get.items():
1442			pouet[k] = []
1443			for f in self.flights.values():
1444				decisions = getattr(f.fpip, 'get_dci_decisions')()
1445				if decisions is not None:
1446					num_dci_check_points = len(decisions)  # how many times dci check was performed
1447				else:
1448					num_dci_check_points = None
1449				if (k == 'origin') and (num_dci_check_points is not None):
1450					icao = self.airports[f.origin_airport_uid].icao
1451					pouet[k] += [icao] * num_dci_check_points
1452				elif (k == 'destination') and (num_dci_check_points is not None):
1453					icao = self.airports[f.destination_airport_uid].icao
1454					pouet[k] += [icao] * num_dci_check_points
1455				elif k in ['dci_check_timestamp', 'estimated_delay',
1456						   'recovering_delay', 'perc_selected', 'dfuel',
1457						   'extra_fuel_available', 'recoverable_delay']:
1458					dci_info_list = getattr(f.fpip, 'get_dci_decisions')()  # list of dictionaries
1459
1460					if num_dci_check_points is not None:
1461						for dci_check_point in dci_info_list:
1462							pouet[k].append(dci_check_point[k])
1463							# for every
1464				else:
1465					if num_dci_check_points is not None:
1466						pouet[k] += [getattr(f, k)] * num_dci_check_points
1467
1468		self.df_dci = pd.DataFrame(pouet)
1469		self.df_dci['scenario_id'] = [self.sc.scenario]*len(self.df_dci)
1470		self.df_dci['n_iter'] = [self.n_iter]*len(self.df_dci)
1471		self.df_dci['model_version'] = [model_version]*len(self.df_dci)
1472		self.df_dci.rename(columns=to_get, inplace=True)
1473
1474		self.df_dci = self.df_dci[['scenario_id', 'n_iter', 'model_version']+list(to_get.values())]

def print_information(self): 
1800	def print_information(self):
1801		for flight in self.flights_uid.values():
1802			aoc = self.aocs_uid[flight.aoc_info['aoc_uid']]
1803

1805				'goes from', flight.origin_airport_uid,
1806				'to', flight.destination_airport_uid, 'with', flight.aircraft)
1807
1808		for icao, airport in self.airports_per_icao.items():

def run_world(self, n_iter): 
1833	def run_world(self, n_iter):
1834		mmprint("Starting simulation at:", dt.datetime.now())
1835		with clock_time(message_after='Simulation executed in',
1836			print_function=mmprint):
1837
1838			print('Running simulation...')
1839			self.n_iter = n_iter
1840
1841			if self.paras['outputs_handling__insert_time_stamp']:
1842				self.timestamp_iteration = '_{}'.format(dt.datetime.now())
1843				self.add_path = '{}_{}{}'.format(model_version, self.sc.scenario, self.timestamp_iteration)
1844			else:
1845				self.add_path = '{}_{}_{}'.format(model_version, self.sc.scenario, self.n_iter)
1846
1847			self.skipping_computation = False
1848			for agent in self.aocs.values():
1849				agent.n_iter = n_iter
1850
1851			self.prepare_everything()
1852
1853			self.env.run()
1854
1855			self.finalise_everything()
1856
1857			mmprint('Memory of process:', int(self.process.memory_info().rss/10**6), 'MB')  # in bytes
1858
1859			dic = {}
1860			normed = {}
1861			for aoc in self.aocs.values():
1862				for key, value in aoc.times.items():
1863					dic[key] = dic.get(key, dt.timedelta(0.)) + value
1864					normed[key] = len(self.aocs)
1865
1866			for flight in self.flights.values():
1867				for key, value in flight.times.items():
1868					dic[key] = dic.get(key, dt.timedelta(0.)) + value
1869					normed[key] = len(self.flights)
1870
1871			mmprint('CPU time per method:')
1872			for key, value in dic.items():
1873				mmprint(key, ':', value)
1874			mmprint()
1875			mmprint('CPU time per method (normalised):')
1876			for key, value in dic.items():
1877				mmprint(key, ':', value/normed[key])
1878			mmprint()
